name: Fiery Arrow
description:
It is an archery game that hits a moving target by shooting a fire arrow.
To track the target, move the device to the left or right.
Feel the fun of tracking the target and the pleasure of archery at the same time.

name: Ketchapp Tennis
description: Welcome to Ketchapp Tennis! Challenge yourself or your friends (via Local WiFi) in this new exciting Tennis game!

name: Lumiterra: Embers of the Legacy
description: Lumiterra is a multiplayer, open-world survival crafting game where you can battle, farm with your friends, or explore mysterious creatures in a vast world!

name: The Dwarf
description: Fight against darkness and take Thaldoh's vengeance. And then accompany the hero Thaldoh's struggle and let grace fulfill itself. Discover mystery and revenge in a fantastical world with a new Role-playing game.

name: Restaurant at the End of Time
description: You find yourselves at the end of time, but your determination to run a successful restaurant remains unwavering.

name: Hospital Doctor: Fix me up for Kids (Boys & Girls)
description: Become a hero of the hospital - help and heal in Hospital Doctor!

name: It's Puzzles: Wild Nature
description: Unleash your inner explorer and piece together the wonders of wild nature!

name: Mega Ramp Moto: Dirt Bike Stunts Simulator
description: Exciting sky-high tracks await you in Mega Ramp Moto - Dirt Bike Stunts Simulator! This game offers you a unique opportunity to experience sky-high tracks where you can perform incredible tricks and jumps.

name: Sex Simulator: Yoga Class
description: A steamy sex simulation game featuring visual novel elements, high definition images and videos, and realistic-looking characters set in a beautiful decor. You play the role of an instructor who shows his clients the sexual benefits of practicing yoga.

name: The Stubborn of WakGood: Afterheat
description:
This game is a fan game by YouTuber Woowakgood with the motif of Isaac Original.
We respect the original Isaac Original, and we do not want to be a substitute for that game. The creators do not distribute the game for a fee or generate revenue through copyright. This game can be downloaded from YouTuber Woowakgood's Naver fan cafe "왁물원".

name: Clonizer
description: Hex-based tactics meets roguelike deckbuilding! Play cards, manage clones, explore unique planets and outsmart aliens. Craft a powerful deck through your expedition and Clonize the universe to become employee of the month of CLONPO!

name: Andarin Weppes
description: A first person puzzle experience of someone with advancing dementia...

name: Keep Killing
description: This is an alternative game where you only need to live to fight, fight to live

name: Impact
description: In Impact, build your deck against hundreds of monsters and defend yourself against your enemies with the best deck. Unlock characters with rogue-lite elements, a wide range of weapons and special abilities as you progress.

name: FarmTech
description: FarmTech is a pixel-art roguelike farming simulator with tower defense/action elements. Embark on a special mission in a world conquered by aliens. Plant, harvest, loot and gain money in the mornings. Defend your farm against waves of enemies in the night.

name: Sword & Spatula
description: A cooperative game for two players where the players take on the role of a skilled cook and a fearless warrior. Together, you must defend against waves of enemies while preparing delicious meals to keep yourself satiated. Two players, one mission: Survive together!

name: Nightmare Manor
description: Welcome to Nightmare Manor - a terrifying horror game that will take you to an old manor steeped in dark history. In this game, you will feel the cold breath of the past, finding yourself in a place where sinister entities live.

name: Operator: Drones
description: "Operator: Drones" is a drone arcade/simulator that puts you behind the remote terminal of your equipment. Fly high - hit low.

name: The Old House
description: A little story about returning to The Old House.

name: So Much Stuff 3: Odds & Ends
description: Discover So Much Stuff!

name: Terror in the Kitchen
description: This is a first person atmospheric horror game. The style of the game is influenced by old graphics trend (PSX games etc). You play as a part timer in a restaurant. You wash dishes, take out trash, pump the toilets and organize the table tops.

name: Realm of the Dead
description: This is a low-polygon 3D game with top-down and first-person perspectives. Control any character, switch perspectives, collect items, and rescue teammates. Use AI or the formation system to operate characters. Face hordes of zombies and respond based on your choices.

name: Cyber Assault
description: Welcome to the world of Cyber Assault, an exhilarating top-down shooter in the Japanese style, set in a mysterious Japanese mountain monastery.

name: Grandpa's House
description: A Short Indie Still and fast-paced Horror Game. Hide your games from Grandpa and survive 7 rounds!

name: Elshe no Shounen
description: A short story about a boy who has been held captive by his "older sister" Elshe ever since he remembers.

name: Cats on Duty
description: Cats on Duty is a purr-fect blend of RTS, tower defense and match-3 mechanics. Manage two game fields at once, arm and upgrade your cat towers to defeat hordes of formidable foes. Enjoy the meow-nificent battle!

name: Silted Prayer
description: A hundred years ago, the chaotic world was suddenly pacified by the sword saint Nedidora, gradually moving towards peace. However, the crisis of the curse of all things was also uncovered... On the dark world tree, what kind of things will Karulu, as a lord, encounter...

name: Ultra Foodmess 2
description: Pack your bags and grab your passport! You and your friends are going on a tasty trip around the world filled with chaos and laughter! Your favorite food characters are back in an even more epic and fun competition (now with a DASH action!)

name: Samurai Kento
description: Play as Kento, an Elder Samurai, and face the evil Yokai in this 2D pixelated mini action RPG set in Feudal Japan based scenarios!

name: The Shadow's Terror
description: You are the unfortunate lab rat of the shadow people, will you prove humanity redeemable, or will you succumb to their terror?

name: Teratale: Tide of Wishes
description: Travel with your mysterious partner Tupa, fight powerful monsters, discover treasures and secrets scattered around the world, and uncover the truth of the world, Tupa and yourself with the help of the tide of wishes.

name: Fledge
description: Fledge is a 2D adventure-exploration game in which the player takes on the role of a young pigeon who leaves his village in search of a bird paradise. His adventure promises to be a thorny one, especially as he has a peculiarity: he can't fly.

name: Creepy Tale: Some Other Place
description: Creepy Tale is a mysterious quest rich in riddles and eerie atmosphere. An autumn morning promised a quiet fishing trip, but events took our hero to "some other place." Find the way home, uncover loads of secrets, and save everyone that you can.

name: Dash For Your Life
description: Dash For Your Life is a clever mix of the platformer and horror genres. Your multitasking skills will be brutally tested as you attempt to jump through levels while avoiding startling jump scares from the monsters chasing you.

name: Light City District
description: A Game And Watch-like game with a cinema noire story, set in an openworld game in real time.

name: Kiru Kiru Kiru
description: Incredibly fast 2D-arena shooter, where you can not stop. Inspired by contemporary shooters, concentrated, ultraviolent and compressed into two dimensions with dark industrial aesthetics. You are a quick saw, ripping flesh and letting the blood out. //Will you start a massacre?

name: FlipTiles: Warp Lines
description: A sci-fi arcade game. Flip tiles to change path ship move on.

name: Climbing Mountain Sins
description: Embark on a challenging journey of redemption in Climbing Mountain Sins. Conquer sins, and climb to heavenly salvation. Master climbing, face obstacles, uncover secrets. A keyboard-breaking, nail-biting adventure. Can you ascend and overcome your inner demons? Rise to absolution!

name: Egg War Puzzle
description: "Egg War Puzzle" is a mixed-mode fighting puzzle action game in which battles unfold in an otherworldly reincarnation.

name: Fingernail Floss
description: A short spooky-fun visual novel where you are a special guest for a special test! Is death a game to you? Do you like color schemes that involve the color black?

name: Draken's Shrine
description: A metroidvania action platformer set in an epic fantasy world where a barbarian woman raised in the wild, pushed by her mother stories about her father decides to look for his final resting place.

name: Orbital Drop Shipping
description: An orbital mashup of physics, puzzles, and business simulation! Navigate packages through a galaxy using gravity and tools like slingshots, mass drivers, and cannons. Create your own levels & share them with the world via Steam Workshop. The ultimate space delivery challenge awaits!

name: Split Personality Doctor
description: A doctor who suddenly gains the ability to shrink his body enters the patient’s body to treat them.

name: Grid-M
description: Grid-M is an action packed grid based Rhythm game featuring an amazing soundtrack. Rise to the top through a welcoming progression system to promoting improvement at all skill levels. Low floor, highest Peak. It time to click to the Grid-M!

name: Kosmo Azs
description: In 2033 in Russia, Vitaly is looking for a job to provide for his family. He is given a good chance to prove his ability to work and get an average paid job. Can he cope?

name: Versus Vampire
description: Take part in the eternal battle between Vampires and Humans. Choose your camp and fight in this new online multiplayer action game.

name: ClownScapades Rally
description: You met him from your birthday party, as one of your family members had hired him to entertain the crowd, however things go dark as you start to have nightmares about him and you end up in strange, unfamiliar places within them...

name: Death the Guitar
description: "Death the Guitar" is a pop and violent 2D Platformer action game. The player is a killer electric guitar whose owner was murdered, and the goal is to take revenge on the humans by manipulating "sound" and "electricity".

name: Battle Craft
description: Battle Craft is a real-time online strategy game with unique heroes, settlement development, and conquering other players online. Strategically place defenses, level up heroes. Experience the one-of-a-kind realistic physics in epic battles on the Steam platform!

name: Wild Mutation
description: Explore and survive a post-apocalyptic sci-fi future, humanity is pushed to almost an extinction, and genetic hybrids rule the world. In a harsh open-world environment filled with danger, craft tools,shelter and weapons, and survive while the war between humans and hybrids echos the wastelands.

name: Let Them Come: Onslaught
description: Survive the relentless offensive of the alien horde in Let Them Come: Onslaught, a sci-fi survival roguelite. The pursuit of the perfect build and an ever-expanding arsenal of abilities are the keys to your success.

name: Pine Harbor
description: Pine Harbor was a small fishing town on the shores of the North Atlantic Ocean, surrounded by cliffs and dense pine forests, shrouded in thick fog. But everything changed as a result of a technological disaster. Explore the town, help its residents, and delve into the depths of the dark forests.

name: Circle of Orion
description: A mother and son are transported from the 21st Century to the mystical world of Orionis. Meet fantastical characters, battle powerful monsters, explore a dense overworld, and discover the truth behind this mysterious world in an adventure akin to RPG classics.

name: Portal Fantasy
description:
Portal Fantasy is a creature-collecting adventure RPG. Journey through an epic storyline, collecting creatures, avoiding traps, and solving thrilling quests in this online RPG with a unique take on a beloved genre. Launching soon in Q1 of 2025!

Collect unique creatures and gather ingredients to fuse and enhance your team. Discover hundreds of combinations, which can augment your creatures, teach them new skills, and even change their appearances.

Unlock Wilderness areas to battle and collect Porbles from 6 different elements with over 50 skills and 60 passive abilities. Conquer Baddies, fuse potent ingredients, and transform your Porbles into ultimate powerhouses. The battle is on!

Journey through beautiful pixelated worlds, navigating perils, solving quests, and meeting with countless quirky characters. A captivating story, tons of side content, and a charming soundtrack await you on your adventures.

Prove your mettle by tackling traps, puzzles, and obstacles. The Wilderness is a dangerous place, as you jump and maneuver across moving platforms, voids, spikes, saws, turrets, teleporters, and more.

Along your adventures, you will become strong enough to battle your fellow friends and foes alike. Meet up with friends to battle it out in PVP on your adventures!

name: Time To Wake Up
description: Imagine being stuck inside a dream. Guided by a voice, you set out to the depths of your mind. Be careful not to dwell in the past or you'll get stuck in its mud. Now go. It's time to wake up.

name: Manascape
description: A roleplaying game set in a dark, new scifi fantasy universe. Make choices and lead your companions through a deep, branching story. Blast your enemies with magic or slice them with your manableid in tactical real time with pause combat as you unravel the mystery of the Lythlavir.

name: That Gun Crafter Cat
description: This game gives you a roguelike bullet hell experience where you play as a cat whose eggs were stolen by the birds. Do your best to retrieve the eggs by Picking up parts to Customize your own gun, and Shoot down the birds.

name: Dungeon Survivors
description: Dungeon Survivors is a top-down fantasy roguelite where you can use your class abilities to fight off a horde of fantasy monsters. Choose from a variety of abilities and items to create unique builds and survive with 1-4 players.

name: Balloons
description: Balloons is a single-player 2D racing game with roguelite elements. You can play as different emotive head balloons, breathe to gain lift, and enjoy fun and challenging tracks. The game has random map generation, different skill combinations. Win by reaching the finish line first.

name: Ar3na
description: Ar3na is a top-down battle arena game that blends fast-paced action with strategic gameplay. Engage in heart-pounding battles against epic foes as you fight for supremacy in a variety of dynamic arenas. Use your wit, reflexes, and cunning tactics to outmaneuver your opponents and emerge victorious.

name: Deckstrander
description: A survival + deck building + story generated simulator. Build shelter, craft weapon & tools, hunt food, tame animal, fight creature, slavery, and story generation with character traits.

name: Forehead Chip
description: Be the first to get a chip implanted in your forehead! Join the IMPLANT CORPS and capture Holdouts in a 2D cyberpunk future - inspired by 80s and 90s sci-fi.

name: The Casino Empire
description: "The Casino Empire" is an exciting game that puts you in charge of building your own Las Vegas-style casino empire.

name: Ion Shift
description: In this hardcore 2D platformer game, players take control of a small and agile creature navigating a vast and menacing space ship. The objective is simple: survive against all odds. The ship is crawling with hostile soldiers, deadly turrets, and laser drones that are constantly on the lookout.

name: Dollar King
description: Cute & cool cat politicians battle in this deck-building game! Play unlimited against players worldwide in this online two-player game! Win by collecting more votes than your opponent using a variety of cards!

name: Runes of Aereal
description: In this fast paced rogue-like deckbuilder you can roam the islands of the Aereal archipeligo in search of the 9 runes that grant immortality.

name: Quantum: Recharged
description: Dodge and encircle your enemies in this neon-drenched revival of the one-of-a-kind arcade classic!

name: Skirmish
description: Skirmish is a Local-Multiplayer Top-Down Space Shooter where players choose a ship and have at it. The last ship in one piece is victorious!

name: Wild
description: Wild is a survival game inspired by the "7vsWild" series. The goal is to survive, fight against dangerous animals, and build your shelter. For that, you are only allowed to take one bottle as equipment, so prepare it well in advance.

name: Float: Champions
description: Float: Champions is an intense skill based platformer where players race to become the king of the hill. Knock down those who oppose you by launching anvils or dishing out slaps as you fight to stay at the top.

name: Stacklands: Cursed Worlds
description: Cursed Worlds is the first DLC for Stacklands. Travel to three different worlds where the villagers are haunted by tricky curses. Build up their village, then use new cards and card packs to lift the curse! 130+ new cards, 50+ new Quests and 15 new card packs!

name: Sapphic Space
description: A women-loving-women choices-matter adult visual novel in a sci-fi setting! Experience lesbian love with an android on a spaceship. Play as Miss Puter, the ship computer, and influence the story towards romance with diverse lady characters and multiple endings.

name: Pandemommyum! Hot Single Moms in My Area
description: Your tomboy neighbour will stop at nothing until she proves you're good enough to get a harem. Even if girl #2 is your boss! A ridiculous +18 comedy visual novel that just might win you over!

name: Harem in Another World
description: Save the world. Get the girls!

name: Spire of Lust & Fetish
description: This magical land has been swamped by darkness and horrible creatures. The Kingdom is defenseless since the enemy captured the girls in charge of protecting it! Rescue them one by one, and you’ll be thanked generously ~

name: Girls Rest
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Sleeve Shock
description: You've just come back from a job, you don't remember what went wrong but all your crew mates are weirdly horny and angry at you, how will you survive their "frustrations" vented upon you?

name: Detective Patch
description: Detective Patch is an adorable 2D turn-based RPG where you solve mysteries and interrogate enemies. Battle menacing foes, meet quirky characters, and solve the mystery of the stolen ruby.

name: Defenders of Cardom
description: Defenders of Cardom is a traditional tower defense game blended with deck-builder roguelite elements. Build your deck, play your cards right, and hone your strategy to defend against waves of enemies!

name: MiniLife: Tournament
description: Build your village under a hail of gunpowder barrels and bombs. Collect resources and defend against enemy sieges. Destroy enemy fortifications with combat llamas and mega mechs. MiniLife: Tournament is a cooperative game where only teamwork leads to victory!

name: GhostCatcher
description: Ghost Catcher is a cooperative horror game that can be played by at least 1 and up to 8 players. You need to perform mysterious rituals in a haunted house, confront spirits, identify their true nature, and ultimately capture them.

name: Alice in Dinerland
description: Embark on a whimsical and treacherous journey through a twisted version of Wonderland in "Alive in Dinerland," a gripping survival game inspired by the beloved tale of Alice in Wonderland.

name: Mtn Chaos
description: Conquer treacherous mountain terrain in Mtn Chaos! Drive powerful off-road vehicles, jump ramps, dodge obstacles, and customize your ride. Experience intense racing and thrilling challenges in this adrenaline-fueled off-road adventure!

name: Coffee, Plis
description: A young man gets to fill in for his colleagues at a large cafeteria franchise as his first job, but things spiral out of control when he discovers chaos, also known as rush hour.

name: Faunamorph
description: Mutant foes await: Transform into different animals and recombine your own DNA to unlock new abilities in Faunamorph. Uncover the mysteries of your origin in this action-packed 2D metroidvania about genetics and mutations.

name: Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door - Hero Mode
description:
A reimagined The Thousand-Year Door story with new elements and puzzles that comes with harder difficulty, badges, and twists!

Hero Mode is intended for "professional players," but can be also played by "casual players" too! With that being said, you don't need to superguard at all to beat Hero Mode.

name: Farm Manager World
description: Dive into the agricultural life with Farm Manager World! Manage your own farm across vibrant global locations, cultivate exotic crops, and build your agribusiness empire. Welcome to sustainable farming at its finest.

name: Night of Wolves
description: Take on an outbreak of lycanthropy in this medieval 2D “souls-like”! Master an intuitive but demanding combat system, meet enigmatic characters, defeat terrifying bosses and unravel an original plot of revenge and fear. Will you eradicate the plague or succumb to lycanthropy?

name: Protect the Planet
description: This is a simple typing game. In the game, the alien from the UFO is very evil, he will shoot many missiles to attack the planet. You need to type and type, to destroy the missiles, to protect the planet.

name: City of Corals
description: Save the coral reef city in this cute tiny adventure game! Meet the colourful residents of this underwater city, explore the streets, befriend different species of fish and help them restore the corals to their former glory!

name: Musical Vibes
description: Discover a new dance game playable with the camera of your smartphone connected to your PC! Dance, hands free, to great music and learn new cool moves!

name: Defenders of Kronos
description: Defeat the corrupted inhabitants of Kronos in this 4-player online co-op adventure. Uncover the source of corruption, collect unique weapons and items, and upgrade your arsenal with stars. Join forces with friends, vanquish hordes of enemies, and save Kronos in this epic co-op experience.

name: Fire All Weapons
description: Roguelike deckbuilding tactical deckbuilding space combat. Make your way home through hostile alien space. Find new technologies, build your deck, survive, and make it home in one piece.

name: ExoSoul
description: Exosoul is an adrenaline-fueled top-down shooter that will test your skills and reflexes. Fight for your life against relentless enemies while trying to synchronize your body and soul. You have a powerful arsenal of weapons at your disposal, but you'll need to use them wisely if you want to survive.

name: The Wine Hunt: Aim Fidelity
description: The Wine Hunt: Aim Fidelity is a quirky AI-driven blend of memory and aim training with a touch of dodgeball. Prove your spatial memory, precision, and dodging skills. Master diverse scenarios, and strive for high scores on the leaderboard!

name: Tattoos and Tulips
description: Follow Chrys as he declares to swear off dating in favor of focusing on himself and hanging out with friends. That is until a very sweet, and very hot tattoo artist named Shay enters the picture. Has Chrys' bad luck gone away?

name: Exodus: Sunflower on the Horizon
description: You're given a chance to find out what really makes the earth turn... But will you like what you see? Exodus is the ultimate sci-fi RPG experience about love, friendship, and deadly monsters.

name: Pesticide Not Required
description: Mow down countless crops and corrupt critters while crafting game-breaking builds! Pesticide Not Required is a bullet heaven, horde survival roguelite with farming elements that offers a myriad of stats and special character traits to create wildly diverse run possibilities.

name: Superbot Arena
description: Design your own Superbot and fight alongside or against others in this VR battle arena! Make your own motion gestures to activate a variety of abilities and effects to aid you in destroying your opponents. Includes AI bots and different game modes like "smash off" and endless play.

name: Oni Academy
description: Play as a new recruit to the "Oni Academy", an establishment which specializes in recruiting female demon hunters. Hunt down demons, advance your character and play alone or with friends.

name: Dungeon of the Forgotten King
description: In DUNGEON OF THE FORGOTTEN KING you will fight against dangerous enemies to obtain Gold, which you can offer to the Magic Altars to become more powerful, hoping to find the way out of the dungeon.

name: Last Signal
description: On a mysterious journey through space, astronaut Adam 'Echo' Winters awakens in an abandoned station with amnesia. He must unravel the dark secrets of the station, where reality and illusion are intertwined. In the Last Signal, your choices will shape the fate of Echo and humanity.

name: Karpatia: Order of the Comet
description: Karpatia is a narrative-driven first-person mystery game, emphasizing the exploration and uncovering of secrets. Help the hero unravel the mystery of an ancient book and stop a dangerous organization that is preparing a global catastrophe. Solve puzzles, explore the castle and its surroundings.

name: Fabled Style
description: Welcome to Fabled Style, the multistyle VR rhythm game. Test your skills using different Warrior Styles on the beat of the music. Strike the notes using multiple weapons while playing through the different songs. Are you up to the challenge to master them all to become the next Fabled Warrior?

name: Phantom Peak
description: Phantom Peak is an thrilling horror game set in an industrial complex. Solve the mysteries of the experiments conducted within these walls and discover the horrifying truth.

name: Faceminer
description: Faceminer is the dystopian narrative-driven A.I. management sim where you build a biometric data processing empire from scratch. Classify dubiously sourced data, upgrade mining infrastructure, and scale up your A.I. surveillance empire to obscene ends in this hardcore thriller clicker set in 1999.

name: Lobber
description: LOBBER is a top down hack and slash where you can hack, slash, and chop your way to victory! Cut off skeleton's heads and catch their skulls to perform powerful moves!

name: Fabled Frontier
description: An open world survival action rpg set in a procedurally generated world inspired by fairy tales. Build your hero as well as a home!

name: Zilla: Shadow of the Bridge
description: An indie action-adventure game about a 'Zilla battling evil Bridge-Kin in San Francisco, vanquishing over-the-top bosses and building alliances on his way to Reach, Overcome, and Vanquish his Kaiju clan's ultimate foe - the Golden Gate Bridge. The Fiend shall Fall!

name: Locator
description: A Geoguessr-inspired detective game set on an alien planet. Pinpoint the exact locations of photos to track down missing archeologist Abigail Lidari. Cross-reference journal entries, decipher cryptic symbols, and uncover the mysteries of an ancient civilization. Find her... before it’s too late.

name: Golful
description: Run, jump, and putt yourself around the map in this golf-themed puzzle platformer. Collect items, test your knowledge, and think critically to solve various physics-based puzzles.

name: Overlord
description: YOU ARE THE OVERLORD. Destroy the thousands that try to slay you and take your kingdom. In your arsenal: tons of deadly weapons, flashy abilities, and shady items. choose between them to completely overwhelm you enemies.

name: Moonlight Mayhem
description: Moonlight Mayhem is a 4-15 player multiplayer horror game where the goal is to eliminate werewolves for humans or vice versa. To do this, you can team up with players, but make sure they are on your side or they could decide to backstab you.

name: Parking Tycoon: Business Simulator
description: Are you ready to immerse yourself in the exhilarating world of car parking management? Step into the shoes of a visionary entrepreneur and become the ultimate Parking Lot Tycoon! Take Charge and embark on a thrilling journey of strategy, expansion, and success.

name: The Witch's Cookbook
description: Concoct magical potions with or without the help of your community's chat. You'll experiment with different ingredients to create powerful spells, but beware - your viewers can add their own twists resulting in hilarious and unpredictable outcomes. Get ready for a chaotic and exciting experience!

name: Slug Gear
description: Slug Gear is an action-packed Metroidvania within a universe of insect-human hybrids. Collect unique trinkets, fight powerful bosses and discover the lost lore of the world!

name: The Math Problem Killer
description: The Math Problem Killer is a crime-themed, math-based, dungeon crawler. The player assumes the role of a Serial Killer Task Force Special Agent that must traverse dungeons by solving complicated math word problems created by a serial killer, in order to rescue a hostage.

name: Strange Seed
description: Evolve your creature using parts from mammals, birds, insects, and even dinosaurs! From your humble beginnings as a shape-shifting slime, build up your genetic potential and adapt your way through the islands of New Haven.

name: Rhythm Dodge
description: Rhythm Dodge is a retro styled music based game where instead of hitting notes on the rhythm of the music you have to dodge them. You play as two sides that you control independently. Making you test your eye-hand coordination.

name: When the Light Dies
description: When the Light Dies is a survival game with roguelite elements set in a desolate, frozen wilderness. Step into a murky world of shadow and obscurity as a lone survivor fighting to keep the darkness and the horrors that lurk within at bay.

name: Astra Intra
description: A short space-horror game where you desperately try to keep the crew members of a defective spaceship alive, as you are all the last hope for humanity's survival.

name: Llamalandia
description: In Llamalandia you play as a cute Llama that got lost in the mountains, prepare yourself to explore a new world that you have never seen before, while you embark on a magical journey across the Bolivian altiplano, facing many challenges in order to find your family and save the rest of your species.

name: 2x4 Nails
description: You are FBI Field Photographer Thomas Greene, fighting and documenting the crimes of a German serial killer known to the press as "Der Kannibale".

name: Kamigami: Spirits of the Nature
description: Get ready for another card battling adventure on Kamigami! Easy to play, hard to master, collect brand new cards, face over 80 opponents, build your strategies and restore peace to the gods!

name: Flying Toyz
description: Fast, competitive sport game where all the map objects are interactable. In Flying Toyz you fight using gadgets to outplay the opponents while playing in an alive room, full of environmental hazards, from which you should stay away!

name: Falling Limbs
description: Falling Limbs is a 2 to 4 player online and local platform fighter game. Customize your samurai, wield a variety of weaponry and vanquish every rival

name: Miskatonic University
description: Manage the world's leading university for delving into the occult and dark mysteries of the world. Retrieve and study eldritch artifacts of ruinous bygone races, probe the limits of acceptable science, & explore occult sites around the world. But to what end? Will you save humanity, or doom us all?

name: Serania: Path of the Scion
description: Choose, explore, interact, fight, solve, gather, trade! An immersive text-based RPG that seamlessly merges the best elements of RPGs, choose-your-own-adventure stories, visual novels, and interactive fiction.

name: The Dynasty Of Cats
description: The Dynasty Of Cats is a Match-3 Game,which featured card game,rougue,and base construction

name: New Yankee: Mary's Dark Side
description: The bond between John and Mary is unbreakable. They embark on adventures together, and always support each other. But their lives take an unexpected turn when Mary's memory is lost. Join John in an epic quest to restore Mary's memories now!

name: Auto Sale Life
description: Build an automotive empire. Buy, sell, and customize cars to create your own brands and showrooms. Become a shrewd entrepreneur in this immersive car trading and customization game.

name: Cat's Cosmic Atlas
description: Gaze upon the stars and other celestial bodies. Cat’s Cosmic Atlas takes you through the Southern and Northern skies. Experience the most beautiful sights and learn a thing or two about the vast Universe that surrounds us.

name: Cthulhu's Reach: Devil Reef
description: An action roguelike co-op dungeon crawler set in a lovecraftian universe.

name: Draw
description: Welcome to the world of Draw, a 2D sidescroller and visual novel! Armed with nothing but a pencil, play as "Stickman" as you explore a brand-new world. Solve puzzles by drawing into the game, meet new friends while dodging scribble monsters, and make memories that’ll never be erased!

name: Crown Gambit
description: Choose the next sovereign in this dark fantasy game, featuring card battles and visual novel-like dialogues with multiple endings. Play your cards well, use your skills with care, and move carefully in these turn-based battles, where the weak rely on luck and the Heroes on their talent.

name: Astrotester
description: An action adventure game. Complete story tasks at various locations-levels. Fight against the dominant forces of the Stream and hostile creatures. Learn more about the world of the Star Network.

name: Golembert
description: Golembert is a beautifully illustrated story game about a Gardener Golem that takes care of the plants and spirits on his own small island. Manage the needs of your plants within a circular economy, grow fresh veggies, barter them with your friends and be ready for an adventure! Are there other Levighosts out there like Helio? How is the Great War related to your garden? And what about the cutthroat Trade Co. that makes life difficult for Frieda? Meet lovable characters, decorate your garden and make the world a better place through your choices!

name: The Ebbing: A Coastal Tale
description: It's the year 1870. You have to solve the mysterious death of Bente Hansen: question the villagers, detect clues, combine them to new information and decipher the mysterious signals that arrive at the station of the first transatlantic telegraph cable in a little village on the northsea coast.

name: Walk the Times
description: Walk the Times is a 3D roguelite RPG that will transport you to an island lost to the currents of fate. Your mission is to rescue the fate of your timeline from the brink of collapse. Will you beat the clock and emerge triumphant, or succumb to the relentless passage of time?

name: Graveyard Gunslingers
description: Shoot down furious hordes of zombies until morning arrives. During the day explore, gather resources, and upgrade your gear to prepare for the next night. Create a unique build combining your favorite gunslinger characters, weapons, and abilities. Survive!

name: Jumpy Paws: World Adventures
description: Casual adventure game where you are a brave puppy traveling the World and discovering new cultures and challenges. Visit iconic places of the world and use unique dog skills to unfold this short and cute story.

name: Zehlar
description: Explore a world full of secrets and magic, inhabited by creatures with unique elemental abilities. Ally with them to embark on your adventure, and train alongside your creature companions to become stronger and conquer the challenges of the world.

name: Swimming Dynasty
description: Take your mark... Go! Create up to 5 characters, upgrade your swimmers, recruit swimmers to improve your team and climb to the top division. Build your team from scratch and compete for the championship! Start your dynasty now!

name: Chiki-Chiki
description: Chiki-Chiki is a multiplayer racing game staged in the colorful reefs of Batabada. This frenzic gameplay based on physics will make you want to challenge all of your friends & family through a smashing versus experience. Make sure you samba hard.

name: Pro Philosopher 2: Governments & Grievances
description: Dive headfirst into everyone's favorite topic: politics! Engage famous philosophers of all stripes, challenge their ideas, and change the world— or just tell everyone they smell terrible. NONSENSE!

name: Slippy the Frog
description: Much like Slippy himself, this game is jam packed with mini games, cuteness, and gallons of juice.

name: Far Out: Selene
description: Step into the role of lab technician Zack Paterson and uncover the mystery of Selene's expedition. With no maps or guidance to rely on, your wits become the sole compass guiding the path. Prepare yourself for an exciting adventure, as multiple endings await your decisions!

name: Time Drive: Racing Destiny
description: Hentai of Multiverse – there are a lot of girls waiting for you in this universe who are ready to go to great lengths, if of course you have a good memory and you can find the same cards for them!

name: Moving Corpse
description: The moving corpse. A body that lies dead is resurrected in search of the flesh of the living. You, a rookie female detective, scramble through the streets of Japan to solve this mysterious case!

name: Tower Stack
description: Tower Stack is a highly challenging and visually pleasing hyper-casual stacking game where the goal is to stack as many tiles as possible on top of each other without losing tile size. The longer it goes on, the faster the tiles move, making it even more difficult to keep your tower from collapsing.

name: StarStorm
description: StarStorm is an RTS AutoBattler which pits players and their personal fleet of starships against mysterious enemies in a fierce tug-of-war.

name: Tiny Europe
description: Do you like to "paint the map", but tired of the complexity? We present to your attention the most stupid and primitive strategy in the world!

name: Princess Paladin
description: A dungeon crawler where you are the minion!

name: Version Three: Invisible Raid
description: Authentic Customizable Mech Action Game. Customize the combat mech "V3" and run through the battlefield!

name: Gore Doctor
description: Gore Doctor is an immersive horror game set to unleash spine-chilling thrills on PC. You find yourself in the institute of a tormented doctor who, driven by desperation after losing his wife, descends into madness and becomes convinced that death is the only respite.

name: Chicken Police: Into the Hive!
description: A wild tale of loss, friendship, conspiracy, and... chickens?! Two rooster detectives are about to venture into the insect underworld to uncover a worldwide conspiracy, while also battling their inherent demons in this animal noir adventure satire.

name: DanDan
description: It's simple, but it needs some ingenuity! ? An action game where bullets keep bouncing! If you attack to defeat an enemy, the bullets you fire will continue to bounce off, so you will continue to avoid your own attacks. Proceed through the stages by adjusting the timing and position of your attacks.

name: Biotopia
description: A slow-paced and relaxing game where you build beautiful, diverse landscapes, and create suitable habitats for any animals you attract along the way.

name: Misgiven
description: Misgiven is a 2D sci-fi adventure about the lump in your throat and how difficult it can be to say certain things. Stranded in a city of masks and toxic fog, find people you can trust and, via a tangible dialog system, experience how scary and awkward, but also how fulfilling, communication can be.

name: Dreaming Chicken
description: Explore and climb high and wide in the mysterious adventure of a chicken who wants to fly and fulfill his dreams.

name: Vox Populi: Spain 2023
description: Play as an existing or fully customized political figure, and campaign for the Spanish general election of 2023! In "Vox Populi: Spain 2023", you and the characters around you will have to promote your ideas and your popularity throughout the country to claim victory!

name: A True Story
description: A True Story is a turn-based strategy RPG based on "A True Story" (a sci-fi story from the 2nd century) by Lucian of Samosata.

name: Elite Rogue
description: Exciting, ever-changing 3rd person roguelike. Defeat monsters, collect powerful loot, and continuously strengthen yourself. Experience indefinite exploration or face the ultimate challenge of the final boss. How far will you push your limits?

name: King Arthur's Petaldust Saga
description: 800 years under the spiked heels of the English. WE DO NOT FORGIVE, WE DO NOT FORGET, NEVER SURRENDER! Journey with King Arthur in this unforgettable visual novel, as he engages in frivolous antics throughout England. Encounter ghastly apparitions, ragamuffins and gasp... ENGLISHMEN! ARGH ARGH ARGH!

name: Homebound Haerold
description: On one really bad day of his own vicious cycle. On his way home, Little Haerold's car breaks down in the bad part of town. And then he breaks down, in the violent way. Now Haerold is Homebound and Postal.

name: Pyroworks
description: Pyroworks is a free-to-play online multiplayer game containing fireworks from real-life companies from all over the globe. You can choose to make your own show, cause destruction and chaos or simulate new years. Don't miss out on playing with your friends - the most fun part.

name: Wagon
description: Wagon is a 1-bit card game where you make tough decisions to try and survive winter on the Oregon Trail.

name: Wordward Draw
description: Explore 4 letter words.

name: Inside Job
description: A reverse tower defense

name: Shadows of Fate
description: "Shadows of Fate" is an exhilarating fusion of fantasy medieval elements, bullet hell mechanics, and dungeon crawling. Step into a mesmerizing world where ancient prophecies intertwine with relentless combat, as you embark on a quest to uncover the secrets shrouded in darkness.

name: Planet of War: The Legend of Fu
description: Save the world the way you want to: Most main and side quests as well as the game itself have several endings depending on your choices. A tactical combat system with over 100 different character and equipment skills. Over 20 hours of gameplay and over 20 original soundtracks.

name: Monochrome Heights
description: Monochrome Heights is a fast paced, challenging 2D platformer inspired by games like Super Mario Bros. and Megaman. It features crisp pixel art, a unique color swapping mechanic, and lots of robots.

name: Etrom: 20th Anniversary Edition
description: A point & click action RPG set in a dark future. Unravel the mysteries of a mystical artifact and your own identity as a fugitive. Explore sprawling cities, engage in epic battles, and navigate parallel dimensions in this immersive techno-fantasy adventure.

name: Senju
description: Senju is a VR experience of traditional Japanese dance (Nihon-Buyo). It is developed in cooperation with Senju-Ryu school of traditional Japanese Dance. You can watch a master of Nihon-Buyo dance and study the motions in detail.

name: The Forest of Conx
description: The Forest of Conx: A spooky noir styled survival horror tower defense game

name: WitchHand
description: You're a witch, leading your coven into new, unfriendly lands. Use the cards you find to build and expand your civilization. Befriend the local covens or use their bones to fuel your spells. Gather your familiars, the witching hour is nigh.

name: Secret Shuffle
description: Social deduction games meets dance parties?! Secret Shuffle is a party game for 4 or more players with phones & headphones. Guess which player doesn’t hear any music but instead pretends to, or find the others dancing to the same music!

name: Rebirth of Arcadia
description: Rebirth of Arcadia is a turn-based tactics game with roguelike elements and contemplative story. Experience the journey of two groups of people working together to escape from the Abyss. Explore, defeat monsters, wield and modify the power of runestones to uncover the secrets of the Abyss.

name: London Cab
description: Imagine yourself as a 19th-century London carriage driver. You must be vigilant, as danger lurks at every corner. Darkness and challenging times make surviving in this world even until the next day difficult. You must be brave and make wise decisions to endure in this gloomy world full of perils.

name: ChronoDojo
description: ChronoDojo is a cute, cooperative tower defense beat 'em up game in which humble heroes travel time to bash, build and save the world!

name: Quarta Amethyst
description: When Olicts, a variety of monsters that prey exclusively on humanoids, begin to surge in the region, Quarta Amethyst, a knight of the Quarta Order sworn to defend the innocent from the Olict menace, is tasked with finding the cause, and put a stop to it.

name: Legends of Duels
description: Legends of Duels is a turn-based multiplayer TCG where champions with unique abilities engage in strategic duels. Build your deck and challenge the world!

name: Deaths Toll
description: Journey across the world with a deadly beast always right on your tail! Go alone or with a buddy as you search for supplies, compete in dance-offs, meet a bunch of weirdos, and fight off hordes of monsters in a randomly generated quest for survival!

name: Unreachable
description: A first-person investigative thriller where your family is kidnapped and you must carry out various demands from the kidnapper in order to prolong their lives. However, if you are sharp, you might also uncover clues to track down their location and devise a rescue plan.

name: Hunchback's Dungeon
description: Destroy hordes of enemies in this top-down roguelike arena shooter. In Hunchback's Dungeon, you play as a deformed, magic-wielding human who can control up to 4 different spells. Unlock new characters, collect unique items, equip powerful spells, and survive until the end.

name: Sudoban
description: Sokoban offers a fresh, new, mind-bending twist on the logic puzzles you love! Clear the board by moving and pushing blocks to line them up in rows and columns of unique numbers! Feed your brain with hand-crafted puzzles built to simultaneously challenge and relax you!

name: VR Dinosaur City War
description: Dinosaurs escaped from human captivity and faced human tank artillery attacks in the city. Players control dinosaurs to fight back against human tanks.

name: Automate Defend Repeat
description: Automate, Defend, Repeat: a cosmic game of factory management and tower defense strategy. Build a planet-dominating factory, defend it from disgruntled elementals, and upgrade until the locals hand over the keys to their world. Once you've claimed one planet, launch off to colonize the next!

name: Hellwatch
description: Join a squad of 4 suicidal to protect the celestial artifact from demon invasion in online cooperative roguelite. Reveal yourself in a munchkin way: support your team or drain their power. Struggle your way to better gear and beware debuffs from death. Kill, die, defeat, repeat!

name: Sword sand Shotguns
description: Swords and Shotguns is a Sandbox Survival MMORPG, combining elements of PvE and full loot PvP with intense real-time combat. Gather resources, craft power gear, and shape the player-driven economy. The entire world is a massive big server.

name: The Secret Ties of Strandcliff
description: A detective game where you fiddle information to your advantage. As an owner of a small bar, listen to visitors of your establishment, overhear their gossiping, collect information and then use to manipulate their thoughts and actions.

name: Jelly & Toast
description: Jelly & Toast is a local co-op game where you control Jelly and Toast on an exciting quest for stolen magical ingredients. Throw your friends or boxes, beware of enemy cooks or kitchen hazards, and explore a world full of culinary challenges!

name: Blind Hope
description: A first-person survival horror with a cosmic twist, where you must blindly navigate a decayed historic manor swarming with warped children with only your vague memories and peripheral senses to guide you. Will your sanity hold? Or will blind hope turn to blind despair?

name: Edward's Journey
description: Set out on an epic journey to find your missing sister in a beautifully unique hand-crafted world full of secrets, puzzles, and danger.

name: Roving Rovers
description: Roving Rovers is a lunar rover simulation representative of the Australian Rover Challenge of 2023. It replicates the challenges that teams in the challenge will perform!

name: Son of Sparta
description: Son of Sparta: Is the first action game to feature a GAY love story-line. Play as Actarius, the ultimate Spartan warrior as he battles he's way through Hades underworld to be with he's beloved once more...

name: Silent Rain
description: Silent Rain is an online co-op, horror game, designed for 1 to 4 players. Team up with friends or brave the terror alone in this immersive horror experience. Explore and unravel mysteries by solving intricate puzzles, all while evading the grasp of a mysterious doctor.

name: Cats Game
description: It is a cat game where you can control a kitty. Eat, drink, play with toys. Run from a dog, drop the vase. Do what usually cats do. Say meow. Explore the world. It is a cat adventure simulation.

name: Please Be Kind to the Chickens
description: A sokoban-style puzzle game. Bend the chickens to your will by manipulating the environment and/or setting them on fire. Explore beautiful open spaces while wrestling with logic-defying puzzles.

name: Traitors in the Hood
description: Traitors of the Hood is a 3D, Multiplayer game for 8 players, which takes place on a foreign planet after rocket fatal crash. With magic, guns and tools, repair your rocket and escape, or kill whole crew as traitor

name: Chains of the Goddess
description: Chains of the Goddess is a delivery mechanism for uncomfortable existential questions, cleverly disguised as a roguelite game. Our lawyers warn that you should not follow financial or medical advice dispensed by the Goddess.

name: Last Hope
description: Engage in intense 5v5 Tactical FPS battles as a skilled military operative. With One Hit Headshots and bullet penetration, precision is vital. Rise through ranks in competitive mode for exclusive rewards. Experience the rush of tactical warfare like never before. Can you be the worlds Last Hope?

name: Midnight Thunder Drive
description: Get your dose of '80s nostalgia! Blaze through neon streets, master turbo boosts, and chase victory. With a synthwave soundtrack and addictive gameplay, unleash your inner '80s racer!

name: Godforsaken
description: You are in a place forgotten by God. Once here, no one will ever remember you again. The only way to survive here is to take up arms and go in search of supplies. Have you met a new ally along the way? Don't trust him, because he can always stab you in the back. Can you live to see another day?

name: Verdict: Descent
description: Establish your written character in a world of many. Roleplay with others in the city of Galvia, exploring six Courts with distinct themes and mechanics. Along the way, meet other characters that you'll have to befriend or battle!

name: Turncoat Chronicle
description: Your father stole his throne, intending to leave it to you. When the long-lost heir resurfaces, will you defend the king—or betray him to his enemies?

name: Midforest Survivor
description: Midforest Survivor is a survivor-like VR game with roguelite elements. Take your guns, shoot the hordes of monsters and upgrade your skills. In this game, you are an ordinary human trying to survive in the middle of an ordinary deadly forest.

name: Brawl Tactics: Origins
description: Brawl Tactics: Origins fuses deck-building roguelikes and the tactics RPG genre like never before - lead your units, collect valuable trinkets and cast powerful spells to ensure victory!

name: The Ravendree Oracle
description: Meet devils, diviners, bootleggers, and showstoppers in a 1920s murder mystery. Solve puzzles, unlock clues, and learn about suspects in this whodunit visual novel!

name: Thousands Rooms Under the Reality
description: Thousands Rooms Under the Reality is a coop survival-horror game that take place inside the backrooms where the players must cooperate together to complete the chapters in order to reaches the deepest level possible while fighting hordes of scary monsters.

name: RPG Alchemy
description: RPG Alchemy is a variation of the Alchemy genre in the RPG theme, so connecting two objects to uncover a third one until everything is discovered.

name: Captain Buttface
description: Captain Buttface is the superhero we all need and want, he is here, so bow down to our saviour.

name: Orpheus: Tale of a Lover
description: ORPHEUS: Tale of a Lover is a fast-paced FPS experience with a touch of absurd comedy. Join Orpheus on his quest to reclaim his beloved wife amidst a bureaucratic hell. No pun intended.

name: Grouphack
description: Grouphack is a survival roguelike where you embody a security program and defend the Mainframe from rogue programs. In each level, disintegrate hundreds of enemies, collect game-changing upgrades to create a unique build, and survive until the timer runs out.

name: Huntsville
description: Huntsville is a Western Horror Shooter with Survival Elements. Try to survive in the cursed mountains of Huntsville alone or with your friends! Various paranormal entities in different forms and with distinct abilities roam around the valley waiting for their prey.

name: Don't Drown
description: Dive into the world of Don’t Drown, an underwater precision platformer. Navigate treacherous landscapes and avoid menacing creatures while balancing your oxygen and health. Line your pockets with treasure at the cost of mobility. Race against time, yourself, and others on the global leaderboards.

name: Dum Game
description: Experience the exhilaration of Dum Game, a competitive multiplayer party sensation! Outmatch your rivals in thrilling rounds to claim victory and become the ultimate champion.

name: Fantastic Fist
description: While controlling a giant fist with your mouse, help Vivi go on a quest to punch the wizard who stole her arms. This surreal platforming game is focused on simultaneous keyboard and mouse controls.

name: Niwatori ni Natta Ore: Kodoku na Majou to no Itsuka-kan
description: Sin descripción

name: Radiant: Guardians of Light
description: Embark on an epic quest in "Radiant: Guardians of Light." Chosen by the spirit of light, battle against Gultar, and his corrupted elemental bosses. Unleash your powers, and team up in solo or coop mode to save the realm from tyranny. Will you restore balance or succumb to eternal darkness?

name: Demon's Blood
description: Demon's Blood is a first-person shooter that throws you into a Demonic universe, Become a special agent, arm yourself and improve your equipment in different games to repel the demonic forces trying to invade your world.

name: Ashes to Ashes
description: Ashes to Ashes is a 2D bullet heaven game set in a dark post-apocalyptic fantasy world. You play as an emissary of an ancient AI tree that sends you out onto the banished land in hopes of fighting off the evil, returning the world to its peaceful state.

name: Astrominer
description: Embark on an epic space adventure in AstroMiner, where you must build a base, overcome challenges, and construct a portal to return home from the asteroid belt.

name: Ad Victoriam
description: Ad Victoriam lets you experience large scale immersive battles and lead Caesar's legions to victory in a groundbreaking simulator! You can start up custom battles or play a full strategy game as you conquer Gaul and establish the Roman Empire!

name: Multishot
description: Multishot is a 2D Multiplayer Shooter Platformer Game. customize your character, change your cosmetic and fight! Take the top of the leaderboard!

name: Time Survivors: Chapter 0
description: Chapter 0 for Time Survivors, the Most Historically Inaccurate Roguelike ever. Slay hordes of minions as Lincoln, Tesla, Cleopatra and other historic heroes with new unique abilities! Collect resources, unlock and enhance gameplay through our tree-based metaprogression. Forge your own epic journey

name: Badlands Crew
description: Create, customize and command your battle wagon to conquer crazed enemy factions and save innocent survivors scattered throughout the lawless Badlands in the aftermath of a devastating apocalypse. Do you have what it takes to Build, Evolve and Fight to survive?

name: Lost Color
description: In the world of lost color, light is lost and only darkness descends. He has many conversations with various cute monsters he encounters in it, and sometimes has thrilling battles with powerful monsters. Investigate the whole world, restore the color they lost, and save them.

name: Obscure Depths
description: Plunge into the unknown with Obscure Depths, an adventure of exploration, survival, resourcefulness, and teamwork. Each dungeon is a crucible of untapped potential, wealth of unseen opportunities, and an expedition into the unknown. Adventurer, are you ready to face what lurks in the Obscure Depths?

name: Legendary Pilots
description: A stylised and unique flight simulator

name: Jump Mechanic
description: A cute 2d platformer with an emphasis on intuitive, expressive controls. Jump, twirl, roll, dive, spin, and more across 6 diverse pixel art worlds.

name: Whittingham Asylum: The Investigation
description: Prepare to immerse yourself in a bone-chilling adventure. Unravel the truth, face your fears, and expose the hidden darkness that lies within Whittingham Asylum. The answers await you, brave investigator!

name: Dark Life Excalibur
description: Dark Life: Excalibur is a fantasy action adventure that tells the story of Aron, a human who is linked to the most famous and legendary sword of all time: Excalibur.

name: Cluck-a-Thon
description: Cluck-a-Thon: Merge and create extraordinary chickens in this enchanting indie adventure. Discover unique chickens and immerse yourself in a charming world of feathered fun! Join the clucking frenzy today!

name: Connection: The Nightmare Within
description: Inspired by the classics such as Resident Evil, Silent Hill and Alone In the Dark: Detective Stone investigates a shadow group. Explore atmospheric levels, fight monsters, and solve puzzles. Unravel a story of twists and turns. Choose classic fixed camera, or over-the-shoulder.

name: Waning Moon Z
description: Waning Moon Z is a 3D action-adventure inspired by games from the early 2000s. Glide and battle your way through a dark fantasy world populated by a range of surreal characters and sinister monsters.

name: The Shaman's Ark
description: The Shaman's Ark is a journey through mysterious and dark lands, full of dangers and strange encounters. As a enigmatic Shaman, you will embark on a quest to battle monsters in order to save the Ark, or condemn it to eternal darkness.

name: Regenesis Ultimatum
description: Regenesis Ultimatum is a short cosmic horror game set in a dead universe where every planet is barren, every sun is burned out. Only one bastion of life remains; threatened by an unfathomable entity of your own creation.

name: Mercenaries Saga: Will of the White Lions
description: Mercenaries Saga 1 is a turn based tactical simulation RPG. It is the first of the series followed by many other solid simulation games: Mercenaries Blaze and Mercenaries Rebirth being the most recent addition to the series.

name: Ovrdark: A Do Not Open Story
description: Ovrdark: Dive into the chilling sequel to 'Do Not Open' in this intense VR experience. Explore a cursed mansion, face your former companion turned ruthless enemy, and unravel dark secrets. Can you survive the ultimate horror in virtual reality?

name: Saddle Up and Drive: El Contrabandista
description: Saddle Up & Drive is a top down car game. Gotta hustle and rustle up some cash. Get involved in shady business with underground stills, land an honest job or race in the County Competition! Every day's a fresh start, and a new job awaits ya!

name: Dracomaton
description: Dracomaton is a top-down roguelike bullet hell about Eclipse, a small robot who awakens in an abandoned factory filled with corrupted training bots and the secrets of cosmic dragons. Fight your way to the top of the tower by transforming your robot body, changing your entire arsenal on the fly!

name: Doomsday Cave
description: This is the post-nuclear war post-apocalyptic underworld as the background of the horizontal action survival game, you have to constantly collect resources to maintain their own and their family's survival consumption.

name: Danger Close VR
description: A VR Mil-Sim by Rockedge Studios

name: Akatsuki Zero
description: Gripping single-player campaign with a rich, branching narrative. Fast-paced multiplayer modes for co-op and competitive play. Diverse arsenal of weapons and equipment. Strategic gameplay that rewards teamwork and smart tactics.

name: Impact Trial: The Lost Planet
description: Impact trial: the lost planet is a space adventure videogame where we will have to escape from an inactive planet through the Impact Trial program.

name: Flat Spot
description: Manage your team to motorsport glory and leave your opposition behind. Flat Spot is a casual motorsport management game that let's you experience fast-paced races, fun encounters off-track and the excitement of owning a team and helping it win the world championship.

name: Hope's Final Defense
description: Hope's Final Defense is an action roguelite arena shooter. Strategize and build your skill deck, craft deadly synergies, and fight hordes of enemies. Choose unique upgrades, obtain powerful equipment, and fight creatures from Negativia to protect humanity's last hope.

name: Dustgrave
description: Embark on an epic journey, enjoying complete freedom in a dynamic sandbox RPG. The world and its inhabitants will witness your deeds and react accordingly, adapting the narrative to your choices and delivering a truly unique and free experience.

name: Waterlab GZD
description: A medium to large map for GZDoom 2.4.0* inspired by and partly based on Waterlab for Doom Legacy.

name: Stickney Installation
description: A 4 episode ultimate doom megawad containing 36 maps. Most are loosely based on the original ultimate doom levels but with unique layouts and gameplay, the maps are inspired rather than being direct remakes. Difficulty is fairly average, later levels should provide a decent challenge without getting frustrating or tedious.

name: Solar Struggle
description:
Solar Struggle is an Ultimate Doom, limit-removing (Complevel 3) community project. Each map was given a name first and then participants were invited to make a level based of it.

The first 3 episodes are comparatively easy and short, and the 4th is ramping difficulty up quite a bit. The maps are balanced for pistol-start primarily.

name: The Ripe Blood Anthology: This World Is Just for the Two of Us
description: Take on the role of Derek — the police chief in a small town. Make decisions that will change the course of the story. Unravel the mystery behind the peculiar behavior of Derek's boyfriend, Chris, and his younger sister. The graphic style is inspired by bara-manga and colorful line art.

name: Fetish Room 18+
description: Fetish Room 18+ is an exciting adult visual novel that will captivate your fantasies. You'll enter a world of erotic adventures, where you can indulge in a compelling storyline and a plethora of adult content.

name: Multiverse Crush
description: Multiverse Crush is a visual novel for adults where you have to save the Multiverse and help a bunch of cool girls along the way. They would be very grateful!

name: Ai Suru Tsuma no Ana wa Tanin no Ana Datta... Bishiri o Sashidashi, Aniki no Nikubou o Onedari Suru Midarazuma
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Uni 2
description: Hentai Uni 2 is a sequel to our last year's hit. Luckily, you can still play it with one hand only. In HU2 you'll get to see both old and completely new characters.

name: Club Velvet Rose: Midnight Bliss
description: Indulge in Club Velvet Rose, an adult visual novel exploring the world of a sophisticated swingers club. Embrace desires, encounter intriguing characters, and dive into a world of passion. Expect stunning animations, inspiring dialogue, and captivating situations. Let the journey begin.

name: Feast Manor
description: After being cursed to never leave, Ember must eat all of the food she can in order to find the one that will break the curse!

name: Lust Hostel
description: Lust Hostel is a first person 3d game where you will play as a manager of a hostel. Interact with hotel guests to learn about its history and enjoy erotic scenes with a camera completely controllable by the player.

name: Swimsuit Samurai
description: This wonderful nude beach has been invaded by a horde of women in admittingly fashionable swimsuits, so it's up to a lone naked samurai to enforce the undress code!

name: Shinjuku Hearts
description: Skateboard into the bustling city of Shinjuku in this beautiful, hand drawn, adult visual novel. Follow the misadventures of Guy as he humorously pursues the affection of sexy ladies and discovers their heartfelt stories. Which girl will you choose?

name: Ai Suru Tsuma, Nagisa no Uwaki Kokuhaku Okuyukashii Tsuma no Karada ga, Aitsu no Geki Piston de Torokete Ita Shinjitsu
description: Sin descripción

name: Pinball Mania
description: This is a Game Boy port of Pinball Mania that was only released in the UK.

name: Void Ninja
description: Void Ninja is VR action platformer with gesture based controls and few innovative locomotions. Run, glide, dive and hook. Slice and arrow the enemies. Randomly generated levels. Design your own challenges.

name: Idolize
description:
Due to the evergrowing desire of the public to become closer to their favorite idols, the industry of celebrity bio-material has become a booming market! While helping in research, however, one celebrity starts to get very ill...

Help an unnamed idol recover from sickness and realize that they aren't alone.

name: Trapped Part Two: The Dark
description: After descending into a hole in the ground, a man finds himself in a dark underground chamber surrounded by stone walls.

name: Trapped Part Three: The Labyrinth
description: David Green once again finds himself beside a dead man. With the key to the front door, he is finally able to leave the house.

name: Trans Ops
description: Trans Ops, Fun, Fast Paced, Third Person, Tactical Shooter with 8 different Game Modes, All original Maps!

name: Bite Size Terrors: Speechless
description: Find what was taken from you at any cost in this Minimalistic Survival Horror.

name: Crimson Spirit
description: Your forest is corrupted, and you are the only one left to save it! Gather the remaining power of the forest and bring it back to the elder tree to revive it!

name: High Strategy: Oradros
description: High Strategy: Oradros is a distilled grand strategy game set in an original, low-fantasy world of hoplites and dinosaurs. There is no micromanagement, only decisions. All 40 playable realms have distinct starting conditions and goals.

name: Primal Earth
description: Open World Animal Survival Game Work together to increase your odds while bringing up the next generation. Explore, interact, and hone your skills to develop your character and become even stronger.

name: Quarantine Town
description: Survive against relentless zombie hordes in an immersive post-apocalyptic world. Battle through waves, explore treacherous environments, and make split-second decisions to stay alive. Can you endure the nightmare and outlast the undead? It's a test of strategy, skill, and nerves.

name: Simil
description: Calm and stimulating puzzle. Connect colors, clear your mind, and unleash your creativity. Over 50 levels increasing in difficulty await you in this colorful journey.

name: Astral Horizon
description: Astral Horizon is a first-person space opera adventure featuring combat with six degrees of freedom. Give orders to your squadmates and find creative ways to approach combat in zero-gravity. Explore epic sci-fi locations as you fight a war to uncover a perspective-shattering discovery.

name: Clash
description: Unleash your inner beast in Clash, an action-packed open-world RPG. Harness enemy powers, upgrade weapons and skills, and dive into fast-paced gameplay. Shape the future and conquer challenges in this thrilling adventure in the atmospheric world, of Feralia Terra.

name: Haunted House
description: Creep, sneak, and dash your way through hordes of ghouls and eerie ectoplasms in this roguelite reimagining of the classic Atari adventure!

name: Tank Strike
description: Blast your way through countless leagues of enemies in this intense top-down shooter.

name: Drone Strike: Engineer Simulator
description: Immerse yourself in an adrenaline-fueled adventure where revenge, engineering prowess, and a race against time intertwine to create an unforgettable gaming experience. Join forces with our resilient hero and conquer the path to redemption!

name: Loopush
description: Unleash intriguing reactions in the fusion of Sokoban and time loops in "Loopush". As a rabbit delivery worker, cooperate with your shadow friend to complete orders within limited steps. Solve puzzles with wit, fulfilling the rabbit's dream on a surprising and creative journey!

name: Clay Monkey: The Master Potter and The Kiln God
description: Clay Monkey is a top-down exploration game based on sourcing materials from the earth to make ceramic art that will be displayed in a final art exhibition. With a dream, not just a monkey; an artist.

name: Maid In Wonderland
description: Your fate, your duty, your - - - - - - - / - - - -.

name: Bl0w-Up
description: Boomer shooter about a robot obliterating aliens.

name: Chimera's Mansion
description: This game is an FPS perspective 3D escape horror game. Use various items to solve the mystery and escape from the terrifying creatures Let's escape from the strange mansion

name: Haunted Station
description: Investigate cosmic mysteries in this immersive sci-fi horror-lite game. Face the challenge alone, or gather a team of investigators with online cooperative multiplayer. Survive your mission, and return with answers. Good luck, and watch your back.

name: March of Tulpas: Xanadu
description: Lies, delusions, become the light that shines on the truth too. This is a poetic,cute turn-based RPG with a bizarre style that adventuring in a looping world ending in three days.Discover the secrets hidden in the depths that lying all over the breaking world!

name: Into the Dungeon
description: Into the Dungeon challenges heroes to annihilate the evil skeleton necromancer before he destroys the world! Play solo or co-op with up to 4 players in this fast paced chaotic card battler.

name: Lost In Winter
description: Get Lost in Winter's atmospheric beauty as a majestic lone wolf, exploring a snow-covered world on a spiritual journey. Uncover secrets, embrace the solitude, and let the enchantment of the winterland captivate you.

name: Nimbit Frontier
description: Nimbit Frontier is a relaxing, futuristic life sim in which you build creature habitats for sale. You'll encounter wild Nimbits, hatch their young, cultivate exotic crops, and delve into the mine as part of your journey. Adapt your establishment to the changing seasons in the seaside community.

name: Cleaning Girls
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Bloom Runner
description: In a world fueled by passion, your speed spells seduction. Perform gravity-defying stunts in fast-paced runs to win over beautiful maidens in Bloom Runner. Breathless rewards await you!

name: Yume 3
description: YUME 3 is a maze break-through game. Players need to use the keyboard to control two characters to reach the designated position, and then they can enter the next level.

name: Witch & Cats
description: Sin descripción

name: Sparky Marky: Episode 3
description: Bad guys often bully classmates. That's the truth. But more often they bully you if you're new, and especially if you are a foreigner. But Toby faces a difficult task - to resist not only bullies, but also a hungry monster...

name: Infinitum: The Backrooms Story
description: Infinitum is a horror open-world survival co-op story game that can be played with up to 4 players. Adventure through the endless procedurally generated levels and discover the multiple endings of the game, every playthrough being different than the last.

name: Gluck
description: Short 2D exploration adventure set in a mining company.

name: About Cannons & Sparrows
description: Prepare yourself for a visually stunning Metroidvania adventure that delivers a cinematic look and an engaging storytelling experience. Embark on a thrilling journey as a small cannon who hatches from a bird's egg, unaware of its true potential.

name: Be My Horde
description: Be My Horde is a top-down 2D survival roguelite. Become a formidable necromancess, and make your enemies a resource! Resurrect each fallen foe, create massive hordes of the undead, and use the harvested souls to enhance your skills, growing more powerful with each death. PRAISE BE MORIANA!

name: Amant
description: Amant is a Sokoban 3D puzzle game where you play as two magnets navigating through tile-based levels to uncover the secrets of an underground facility. See the other side of the level with a flexible camera and solve magnetic puzzle.

name: Chronicles of the Wolf
description: Step into the boots of Mateo Lombardo, an apprentice of the Rose Cross Order who finds himself the sole survivor of a viscous attack. The next chapter in the Migami Monsterverse growls through the trees. Are you brave enough to face it?

name: Fallen Angel: Hell Survival
description: An Open World Sandbox First Person Survival Game set in Hell.

name: Root Of Win
description: Root of Win is a 3D puzzle game where you solve levels with a friend or stranger in a co-op or alone.

name: Matt Sandorf: Journey to Endless Entertainment
description: In this advergame made for Sony, Matt Sandorf sneaks onto a high-tech space station resort to see a Beatles reunion concert, but soon finds himself part of a sci-fi adventure.

name: Automata 10 Pack Volume 2
description:
A collection of 10 games (on one cassette). The following games are included:
- Pi There!
- Xtroth - The Adventure
- Nth Zone
- Toilet Truble
- Paradise in Microdot
- The Egg
- Chambers of Death
- Nudgeit
- Pi in the Sky
- The Pimans Cocktail Cabinet

name: Paris Transylvania
description: A turn-based vampire-slaying Pachinko Roguelike Deckbuilder mayhem! Collect a powerful deck of cards, strategize, aim, and pop pegs to power up and deal massive damage with relic synergies. Play as Marie Antoinette, explore and conquer Transylvania, defeating mighty vampire clans and hordes of evil.

name: Plong
description: Roguelike brick-breaking arcade game. Wreak havoc as a rogue virus in the distant year of 1998.

name: The One Who Stands Behind
description: Survive hordes of monsters in a deck builder with a tactical grid while engaging in existential conversations with your avatar.

name: How!?
description: Dive into How!? - a thrilling cooperative game. Two adventurers discover a pyramid hiding a coveted artifact. Puzzles, traps, and cooperation await. Will they make it out alive?

name: Evil Castle & Princess
description: "Evil Castle & Princess" is a game similar to Metroid Castlevania, mainly a horizontal action game based on exploration and combat. Wear your favorite weapons to explore the mysterious and dangerous relic castle! Destroy all the monsters that block you and find the secrets of the magic castle.

name: Hidden Series 1
description: Experience the engaging and addictive Hidden Series 1 game to find the hidden objects across 40 challenging levels. We have carefully crafted the puzzles which will give the ultimate challenges unlimited fun and allow you to relax.

name: Bombshell Barista: Speed Dating
description: Bombshell Barista: Speed Dating ---This is an adult, size kink-themed dating sim for the Bombshell Barista series!

name: Fernageddon
description: A combat based RPG / strategy game.

name: Duskbound
description:
Made for Otome Jam 2023.

Gothic horror otome with a yandere vampire LI.

name: The Siege of Jeomdo
description: In this narrative-driven RPG, play as Dujom, a retired war veteran compelled to lead Jeomdo Village amidst dire circumstances. Make critical decisions, manage resources, and defend against overwhelming odds.

name: The Last King
description: In The Last King, a strategy action RPG, customize your character, craft weapons, build your base, and defend against Persian invaders. Lead your army into real-time battles, commanding and fighting alongside your troops in a strategic war game. Experience an epic journey of conquest and survival.

name: Glorious Storm
description: Glorious storm is a real time strategy game with turn by turn strategy. It will be easy to understand and to master. When you start a new campaign, you can choose your appearence and the appearence of your army. The game is focus on giving a feel of 19th century battle and ambiance.

name: Frogs Also Struggle
description: Platformer with simple jumping mechanics, you will know why frogs also struggle.

name: Empire Origin: Rise
description: The grand strategy game "Empire Origin: Rise" is coming. Explore the traces left by human civilization on the earth, pursue the great achievements of the kings in the historical fragments, and revive the brilliant civilization in history. glory? territory? Waiting for you to dominate the world!

name: Noel the Mortal Fate: Season 3.5 - Revenger's Vacation
description: Caron proposes a seven-day vacation for Noel, who is exhausted from the battle. Noel, who is spending his vacation in an unfamiliar place, eventually decides to search for the owner of the "safe house".... Gather information as you explore the slums at your leisure and find the owner.

name: Rise of Koreth
description: Uncover the mysteries of Koreth's resting place in this exciting hack n slash, dungeon crawler, platformer adventure.

name: Achievement Display Cabinet
description: Achievement Display Cabinet is a casual game with 3 built-in mini games.You can earn Steam achievements by completing game tasks and decorate your Steam personal homepage with these achievements.

name: Myriad Mayhem
description: Myriad Mayhem is a challenging horde survival game where you create builds with abilities with excluding talents in talent-trees, to survive and protect your peoples castle from a myriad of monsters, before they overwhelm you.

name: InterSpace
