description: A portal-like puzzle game with stealth combat and unique missions for each level. It is the perfect combination of puzzle and FPS, with stunning graphic and great storyline to back it up.

name: Amazing Space
description: Welcome to the world of space stations! Create your own space base with workplaces and production facilities. Ensure sustainability and safety, explore space, defend your base, and build diplomatic relationships. Be vigilant and successful!

name: Welcome to Kowloon
description: This is an indie horror from the first person, in which you find yourself in an area called Kowloon in search of cheap housing. The inhabitants of this place only at first glance seem to be ordinary people, but if we dig deeper, we will see their real faces.

name: Panzerfaust
description: An authentic, single and multiplayer armored combat simulation set in WW2 featuring numerous vehicles, infantry and support assets.

name: Lil Johnny Goes Home
description: Welcome to the world of Lil Johnny, a thrilling 3D platformer adventure designed by our high school class! Get ready to embark on an extraordinary journey alongside our courageous protagonist, Lil Johnny, as he finds himself in an unknown realm after falling through a mysterious portal.

name: The T.O.T.E.: Tales of the Elements
description: Save the world from the bad music of the Evil Music Industry in this cooperative 2D Hip Hop action RPG!

name: Shy Dogs Hidden Orchestra
description: Shy Dogs Hidden Orchestra is a hidden object game where you need to find musician dogs that are embarassed to play their music. It's like Shy Cats Hidden Orchesta, when you find them, they will play songs for you.

name: Super Words
description: Super Words is a reversed crossword puzzle & word game. You need to place and connect all words on the board according to the given clues

name: Warlordocracy: Chapter 2
description: Warlordocracy Chapter 2: Import your party and reputations from the previous chapter or create a new character from scratch.

name: Invasion Eternity
description: Embark on an epic ninja adventure in a world filled with thrilling quests, powerful champions, and strategic multiplayer battles! Assemble your team of elite warriors, conquer bases, and reap passive rewards to strengthen your champions. Dominate the battlefield!

name: Team Rise
description: Discover the fun of team climbing! Explore all the secrets, shortcuts and traps! Share this adventure as a team, or do it alone.

name: Thrust Master Deluxe
description: Thrust Master Deluxe is a Rocket-Powered Co-op Combat game where Pilots and Gunners out-maneuver and gun down the competition. Become the most lethal Pilot, the most ruthless Gunner. Become Deluxe.

name: Blood Midnight Blossom
description: A visual novel with a breathtaking story about two very different girls who unexpectedly find themselves connected to each other.

name: The Bugger!
description: Welcome to Silicon Island, where you are the only programmer in town! You enjoy the simple life of diskettes and dial-up connections, until one day your boss ruins it with an email. He sends you some files to review, but your computer explodes and releases a swarm of bugs that infect the island.

name: HPL: Nyarlathotep Rising
description: Deep dive into the HP Lovecraft perverted universe with this oversized narrative RPG. Slip into the intertwined souls of Mark, Anna, and Victor, surrounded by cult worshippers, as Nyarlathotep, the cosmic horror, strives to enslave humanity in 1929.

name: Archipelagates
description: Archipelagates is an adult fantasy hack slash and loot game. Create your character and search dangerous islands for resources, weapons, and armor. Forge relationships with other inhabitants, friendly or romantic.

name: Good Luck My Lord
description: Good Luck My Lord is a deckbuilding game where, as a feudal lord, your goal is to collect various resources to contribute to the King. Collect resources each week and submit resources each quarter. Try using different items, upgrading your fief, or obtaining special items to earn more resources!

name: Last Hope Bunker: Zombie Survival
description: Attention, brave survivor! The world has fallen victim to a devastating virus that threatens humanity's very existence. But amidst the chaos, a glimmer of hope remains. Join the gripping story of Last Hope Bunker and embark on a heart-pounding journey to save humanity from the clutches of the undead

name: Wrenched
description: Wrenched is a 3d bullet hell platformer where you dodge bullets and destroy robots with a giant sword! Explore a post-apocalyptic wasteland, meet its survivors, hijack vehicles and platform your way through dangerous areas! All to get parts from the guts of giant killer robots!

name: Slide Ball Master
description: Slide Ball Master is a new puzzle game with unique gameplay where you shoot bricks with your slingshot. With Carom's billiard-like gameplay, it's very important to calculate your shot.

name: VR Rescue Girls: Moe
description: Find the girl figures hidden in the room! Have xxx with the girl whose figure you find!

name: Make Way
description: Speed around loops, dart through train crossings, drift around helter skelters, and unleash wacky weaponry in this modern take on classic top-down multiplayer racing games. The twist? You build the track.

name: Once Upon a Tile
description: Once Upon a Tile is a strategic dungeon-builder, where you don't control the hero! Instead, you cleverly place dungeon tiles to guide your hero to victory - or to their demise, if you are careless. You will need to be tricky and clever in this dungeon-building puzzle game!

name: Katuba's Poacher
description: ''Wanted!!'' Chatch the Adoarble 'Sharp' for Reward! "Katuba's Poacher" is Boss-Battle action game with a cartoon and animation style.

name: Punchimals
description: Puchimals is a physics-based 2.5D fighting game set in a world where cute, chubby animals settle their differences by duking it out in giant mechs. Due to a lack of exercise (certainly not caused by overuse of mechs in everyday life), obesity and mech combat has ravaged the globe!

name: Feluna Base
description: A tiny base builder roguelite where the only enemy is time. Provide food and shelter for your growing outpost. Produce advanced resources for your home station. Discover the mysteries of Feluna with every new run.

name: Nqc: Non Qualia Character
description: RPG where human who became NPC find himself.

name: Rarity Chase
description: Rarity Chase is an adventure for board game fans. Quickly learn simple rules, roll the die and go in search of an ancient artifact. Find and wisely use resources and bonuses. Play alone against AI, with friends on the same computer or online.

name: Pawggle
description: Pawggle is a physics puzzle game. Help poor-sighted adorable fur creatures by strategically positioning your pegs and immerse yourself in a joyous furry symphony.

name: Summoner Arise!
description: Turn-based. Tactics. Roguelike. Summon units and battle your way past wave after wave of enemies. Start with a fixed amount of mana as you ascend a mysterious ruined temple. Run out and you lose. With hundreds of upgrades available, customize and command your army to victory!

name: Seagull Kart Racing
description: A frenetic and fun racing game across space and time where you must dive and fly to be the first seagull to cross the finish line!

name: Ascendance
description: Ascendance is an upcoming space strategy game in which the player takes control of a civilisation taking its first steps into into space. It features a massive game world, a deep simulation of civilisations, and real-time strategy space battles.

name: Sky Harvest
description: Sky Harvest is an Open World Farming Game set in a fantasy town named Magica where you play as Zacharias whose goal is to manage the farm on a floating island and supply the crops in the City below.

name: KKCKC
description: Become a Keyboard Key Character and become a Keyboard warrior who fights with 53 Keyboard Keys! 'KKCKC' is an action roguelike game that uses only the Keyboard to kill enemies! Survive your stronger enemies and pay back your colleagues' grudges!

name: The Adventure of Ted and the Lost Magic Crystals
description: Ted is interested in finding the lost magic crystals the source of life for the squirrel's kingdom. for the reward, of course, a chest full of gold from the King of Squirrel's kingdom.

name: Crossroads Inn 2
description: Immerse yourself in Crossroads Inn 2, an enhanced real-time management sim set in the mesmerising fantasy realm of Delcrys. Build your inn, manage the menu, services, staff, and guests, and become famous in every corner of the continent. Your inn, your tale - your world to explore.

name: The Friends We Left Behind
description: The Friends We Left Behind is a puzzle-solving horror game where you must survive different "escape room" situations to win. Play 5 separate bone-chilling levels with unique gameplay featuring different Imaginary Friends. Play solo on your PC in a dark room and volume turned up high, you chicken.

name: Flip Joy
description: Welcome to our casual game! Get ready to challenge your brain. Gameplay: You will face a grid of 16 cards with their backs facing up. Flip two cards at a time to find matching patterns and eliminate them. Your goal is to clear the grid. Completing levels unlocks CG rewards.

name: Sinder Blade
description: Sinder Blade is a dark fantasy action roguelike where you combine powerful skills to create game-breaking combos. Use both fire and lightning to unleash absolute destruction! Discover more mighty Sinders, find legendary artifacts, and learn more devastating skills to conquer the battlefield.

name: Canopy
description: Canopy is a non-violent exploration crafting game set in the heart of the rainforest. Gather your friends and embark on an unforgettable cooperative adventure, where camaraderie is key, and teamwork is essential.

name: Limbs Inc
description: Physics simulation mayhem inspired by QWOP and Happy Wheels. Craft, program and control robots, complex machines and vehicles. Build devious obstacle courses to drive online players insane!

name: Annum Crossroads
description: Navigate a vast wilderness, battling countless enemies with the goal of liberating a desperate civilization from tyranny.

name: Super Crazy Rhythm Castle
description: It’s Super Crazy Rhythm Castle, the chaotic rhythm adventure! A puzzling co-op mashup unlike anything you've ever heard. Solo, or with a band of up to three friends… Can you conquer the castle?

name: Pretzel Rides VR
description: Sin descripción

name: Meteor Crusher
description: Sin descripción

name: Firefighter Simulator 911: Car Fire Truck Driver
description:
Strap on your helmet and duty belt, and get ready for the mission! Explore over 30 areas inspired by real locations across the United States!
In the game Firefighter: Firefighter Simulator 911 : Car Fire Truck Driver, you'll step into the shoes of a real fire brigade worker in a large American city. Experience thrilling tasks in more than 30 different locations, all inspired by the scenic landscapes of the US West Coast. Drive carefully recreated Rosenbauer America vehicles, extinguish fires using heavy firefighter equipment and tools!
You'll have access to authentic firefighting equipment, including helmets, safety shoes, firefighter axes, crowbars, water guns, and breathing apparatus from renowned American manufacturers.
Fire alarm! Time is of the essence! Put on your shoes, zip up your firefighter uniform, secure your duty belt, don your helmet, start the fire truck, activate special signals and sirens, and take the shortest route to save lives.
Whether it's an industrial area, the suburbs, or the city centre, firefighters are needed everywhere to rescue people! Do you have what it takes to become a highly skilled firefighter? Take on the challenge right now and become the city's number one lifesaver!

name: Wildshade: Unicorn Champions
description: Cross the finishing line riding a unicorn!

name: Formula Retro Racing: World Tour - Special Edition
description:
Formula Retro Racing: World Tour - Special Edition includes:
- Base Game
- 2 Free Stickers
- 6 New Unique Tracks
- Reversed Track Variants
- Bonus Gameplay & UI Features

name: World of Outlaws: Dirt Racing - 23 Edition
description: The Official Game of The World of Outlaws, built in collaboration with iRacing!

name: Scamper
description: You are a rat. Your fear response will be tested.

name: Another World in the Morning
description: The player must choose one of three jobs to defeat the enemies of the other world. Each job has a different special skill, and it is a 2D platformer game with the goal of sealing the demon king by defeating bosses and obtaining stones suitable for attributes.

name: Nautical Dispute
description: Retro nostalgic big voyage game, dream back to the road of great voyage! Exploration, management, trade, piracy and war are constant topics. With wisdom and luck, gradually build a powerful fleet. Set sail, take the Golden Silk Road again, and reproduce the great voyage!

name: Nine Nights
description: 《Nine Nights》is an indie hardcore action-adventure game. You will become the killer Ci Lang, escape and fight back in the crisis-ridden world of Nine Nights. You have to rely on the high martial arts skills tenacious fighting, struggling to lead to the road to revenge.

name: Chasemaster
description: A perfect blend of adventure, racing, strategy and speed. Chasemaster is all about completing your mission and escaping the city to your agency safely. Make quick decisions, outplay the police and get back safely!

name: Forest Frenzy
description: Shoot to survive, shoot em' up, score attack! A wave based shooter where you must buy weapons and upgrades to survive! Get local high scores or compete on steam leaderboards!

name: DumbSquad
description: Fight and survive in this post-apocalyptic world, infested by wild mutated monsters! Challenge your skill as a Hunter against these dangerous beasts!

name: Afterland
description: Afterland is a roguelite FPS Cooperative, each game is a new adventure, new monsters, weapons, bonuses and dungeons will appear. To win the game you must explore several dimensions without dying. The adventure can be played with up to 4 players in co-op.

name: Tales of the Laser Knights
description: Zak needs to save the galaxy! Explore all 5 known planets, upgrade your Laser Katana, learn how to fight the evil ... and go on an intergalactic adventure, in this sci-fi b-movie Action-RPG!

name: Holiday Party: Mascot Brawl
description: A silly multiplayer party game, Holiday Party: Mascot Brawl brings festive cheer with battles and mini-games matched with absurd weapons. Compete against friends and roast them with a flamethrower and slap them with a GIANT FISH. Jump into this hilarious holiday-themed brawling mayhem today!

name: Boba Boyz
description: This all-new video game musical centers around a bubble tea shop with a secret: their boba actually brings happiness to its customers! When the boys need a new employee after their last crew member mysteriously disappears, boba won't be the only thing you fall in love with.

name: Khaligrad
description: Slip on the boots of a freshly-arrived officer in Khaligrad, a captivating strategy game that plunges you into the heart of a grueling military campaign. Lead your battalion for the Empire or the Union, with intense turn-based battles and unforgiving management phases.

name: Mewnition
description: A co-op adventure game for 1-16 players, set in a voxel environment teeming with gargantuan beasts and powerful artifacts. Forage for resources, fortify your arenas, and fight fearsome foes as you reshape the world and uncover the truth of how it came to be.

name: Remnants of Dawn
description: A string of campus killings. A newly-turned vampire struggling to adjust. A monster hunter seeking answers. Worlds collide as Dante Jones and Nick Torres, both in danger of being accused of the crimes, team up to reveal the true culprit in this chilling supernatural horror visual novel.

name: Containcorp
description: Containcorp is a management simulation game inspired by the SCP Universe and driven by AI Storytellers. Construct your base, design containment areas, and employ brilliant minds to study anomalies. Where Gunplay, Psychology, Medicine, Biomes, and more blend seamlessly.

name: Shattered Reflections: The Abyss Within
description: Immerse yourself in the captivating perspective of Evelyn as you embark on an exploration of a haunting realm where realities become distorted. This psychological horror game offers a compelling experience that unravels the enigmatic secrets concealed within a dark era.

name: Tatonka the Space Whale
description: Sci-fi, Space themed. 2D, Fast Paced, Twin Stick shooter. Play as Tatonka in her story to reunite her family or play as her and other characters in a rogue lite type wave survivor.

name: Demonsomnia
description: Demonsomnia is a CO-OP horror video game developed and published by Woziva on Steam. It is a 4-player online CO-OP horror game about the impact of post-nuclear reaction. Radiation spread all over, put on your gas mask and go to the forest, collect the objects, and return to the mansion. Your goal is to gather evidence with equipment and hunt down the ghost.

name: The Witch of Shunrald
description: The Witch of Shunrald is an isometric action-adventure game that incorporates storytelling elements. Players can directly control the witch's staff using mouse controls, enabling ranged attacks, close combat attacks, and manipulation of certain objects in the environment.

name: Par for the Dungeon
description: Putt, explode and fight with everything from grapple hooks to laser beams and conquer over 100 increasingly puzzling levels!

name: CookFriends
description: CookFriends is a cozy open world, cooking & delivery game. And we have splitscreen co-op! Gather a friend and have fun in this tiny, but content heavy world! Where you need to take care of your own restaurant, make deliveries, customize your bike, meet citizens, solve puzzles and enjoy stories!

name: Ploko
description: Embark on Ploko, the enchanting VR dream-builder! Create mini-worlds, piece by piece, and watch them come alive. With themed levels, a friendly companion cat, and immersive VR features, it's the cozy VR experience you've been craving!

name: The Hungry Town
description:
The Hungry Town is an interactive visual novel in a dark fantasy setting with vampires.
You are a young vampire who has been drawn into a violent confrontation between two generations of vampires. You will have to choose a side or decide to stay true to yourself.

name: Dungeon's Anima
description: Dungeon's Anima is an Action Roguelite for up to 4 players where you play as the Shadowmancer, the last undead foot-soldier now imbued with the final vestiges of the Dungeon Heart's power; collect the souls of your enemies to reclaim your dominion from the hands of the Human Empire.

name: Elewar: Fused Survivors
description: Slay, evolve and overcome! Packed with challenging events, non-basic enemies and deep ARPG-like systems! In this horde survival roguelite you use elemental powers to defeat terrifying monsters, while trying to become a godlike magician. 15+ spells, 70+ unlocks, over 30 random events and much more!

name: The Happy Card Battle
description: Pure original storyline and new gameplay, featuring 14 unique heroes, 54 playing cards, over 100 Elf Hearts, and over 100 selectable cards, creating a unique fast gaming experience with only three to five minutes. More heroes, skills, and cards are still expanding

name: Searchbar Detective
description: Searchbar Detective is a 2D Mystery Game set in a virtual world in which you use your searchbar to solve crimes and uncover conspiracies.

name: Triplane Furball
description: Prepare for intense dogfights in Triplane Furball, a 2D aerial combat game. Conquer singleplayer campaigns or engage in customizable multiplayer battles against friends. Skill, precision, and lightning-fast reflexes are key to victory!

name: Claymores of the Lost Kingdom
description: We blended a Roguelike Deckbuilder with classless RPG progression to give you an open sandbox adventure. Forge your hero and increase your attributes to craft a deck that changes based on your unique build. Level up, hunt bandits, and get strong enough to face the Harbinger of Doom.

name: Vasilisa the Wise
description: Vasilisa the Wise is a visual novel based on the famous Russian fairy tale "The Frog Princess". However, unlike the well-known fairy tale, in this game there are several scenarios, depending on the actions of the player. The goal of the game is to defeat the evil and win the heart of Vasilisa.

name: Dimenders
description: Dimenders is an online horror game playable in cooperative mode for up to 4 players. You and your team are recruited to investigate the emergence of portals linked to other dimensions. Your mission is to solve various puzzles to find the solution and close all portals.

name: Gunslinger Express
description: Defend a moving train against relentless bandit attacks. Shoot enemies, repair wagons and upgrade your character as you explore diverse regions each with unique guns, enemies and upgrades.

name: Bad Egg
description: One little egg vs an army of zombie chickens! Get to the chopper or you're clucked. A free-range frenzy of arcade action from the yolked-up eggheads behind Shell Shockers.

name: FourthMotion
description: Fourthmotion: A biped controller enabled game where you collide with vehicles, jungle animals, and use physics to balance. Fast-paced and thrilling!

name: Pinball M
description: Get ready to tilt into terror. The new horror-inspired pinball platform for fearless players. Prove your skills on the most sinister, gory, and badass tables ever brought to life.

name: Halls of Watershot
description: A deck-building ARPG in a dark fantasy setting. Find powerful items, wield elemental magic, and battle dangerous monsters as you explore a dark and twisted castle. Combines the decision making and variety of a card game, with the fast paced combat of an ARPG.

name: Undying Fortress
description: Wield your magic sword against the monsters that fill a mysterious tower, and uncover the secrets of the past!

name: Scape Run
description: A terrifying Party Royale that will fill you with tension, fear and frenzy, pure adrenaline like you have never experienced before.

name: The Dream Office
description: Welcome to "The Dream Office," an immersive game that allows you to step into the shoes of a master office designer and renovator. Prepare to embark on a thrilling journey where you'll transform drab and cluttered workspaces into stunning, productive havens that would make anyone's dreams come true.

name: Goblin Camp
description: Goblin Camp is a fantasy city-building game inspired by Finnish mythology. Deep simulation mechanics capture the unique challenges of surviving the harsh winters and carving a thriving settlement out of the northern forest. Lead your goblins to greatness!

name: My Littlest Skeleton
description: My Littlest Skeleton is a cosy and relaxing simulation where you care for your very own little Skeleton chum! Pull your unique Skeleton back from the depths of the Nether Region. Attend to their needs, maintain their furnishings, choose from a variety of environments for your Skeleton to call home.

name: Mountains of Madness
description: A first person horror exploration game set in the frozen wastes of Antarctica. Use your tools to navigate the frozen galleries untouched by millennia and unearth evidence of a dreadful truth while you search for a madman whose ill fate lies somewhere beneath these Mountains of Madness

name: The Solace Paradox
description: Work together with your friends to explore a magical island, solve puzzles, and unlock the mystery of The Solace Paradox in this 2-4 player cooperative puzzle adventure.

name: Little Droid
description: In the game "Little Droid" you will find exciting levels with a variety of traps, obstacles and riddles. You will explore amazing locations including a secret bunker, deep dungeons and mysterious forests. Each level offers new challenges and secrets to uncover.

name: Rivencrest
description: Unleash strategic mastery in a captivating team-based adventure, as you assemble and customize diverse squads to conquer challenging levels, vanquish formidable foes and unravel the mysteries of the village.

name: Dreadwinter
description: Dreadwinter is a single-player, fantasy coffee shop RPG, where the game's story and experience is centered around how you play. Whether you want to run a thriving business, explore the world, or just make good coffee, how you run Dreadwinter is up to you!

name: Diehexegy
description: Diehexegy is a hex grid turn-based 4x game with a unique twist: your armies are composed of dice. It has multiple victory conditions and straightforward gameplay. Challenge friends or fellow strategists in asynchronous multiplayer matches.

name: Dino Path Trail
description: Dino Path Trail is a journey across a Wild West full of dangers in a world where dinosaurs have never gone extinct. Set up your camp and bring it along thanks to your classic western wagon towed by dinosaurs. Explore canyons, mountains and swamps and survive the harsh environment and predators.

name: Survivor: Castaway Island
description: Do you have what it takes to outplay your mates and become the sole Survivor? Explore a deserted island where you can only rely on instinct and strategy to outlast competition and survive on the island.

name: The Thundermans: Heroes & Villains Unite
description: A robot has gone berserk! Help either Max or Phoebe clean up the house in their signature style.

name: Bite Size Terrors: Reverse Blue
description: The Bright Blue Sky... Is Hiding Something.

name: SokoChess Black
description: SokoChess Black is a puzzle game about pushing and capturing Chess pieces while overcoming various obstacles. Enjoy 70 different handcrafted levels with a unique twist on the Chess formula.

name: Artifice
description: Adventure across two worlds, fight cyborg managers, learn magic, and save the world from a sentient AI in this turn-based RPG inspired by the classics of the genre.

name: Nightshift Survival
description: Survive Till Dawn. Nightshift Survival is a rogue-lite action game where the objective is to survive the night. Are you able to survive in this park?

name: Eventide Matter
description: Eventide Matter is an action-packed 2D arena shooter. Survive as long as possible, upgrade your ship, unleash your godlike potential, and shape the destiny of the universe!

name: Together in Between
description: Together in Between is a first-person adventure-puzzle game. You have been imprisoned in a magic book with your partner, in the same place but in different dimensions. Will you be able to overcome the Wizard King's puzzles, and see your partner again?

name: Hideout
description: The city in war. Life in danger. You make your way through the fights and reach the old hideout. Survival depends on the mind and the resources. There is very little food and electricity. As you lose your sanity, the presence of paranormal entities increases. You will have to fight for survival.

name: Exilium
description: Exilium is a fast-paced Roguelike Shooter where skill and item synergy are crucial for survival. Explore a variety of play styles with dozens of weapons at your disposal. Collect items to enhance your abilities, but be wary of descending into madness...

name: Escape Stories: Virtual Reality
description: Leveraging the power of virtual reality headsets and controllers, players navigate three themed levels unlocking their path home by solving puzzles that open the way to freedom.

name: End of Legends
description: Unleash your Darklord in this captivating card game. Dive into roguelike adventure, cast powerful spells, and evolve cards. Explore upgradeable cards, summon formidable minions, and unleash devastating spells. conquer all. let the light prevail in this dark fantasy realm.

name: Death Ration: Back to 19XX
description: In Death Ration, You can confront the aliens to save the world, uncover the truth behind the spread of nanomachines and invasion, dedicate your remaining time to work for the community of refugees, transport supplies to camps using trucks, decorate your own house with furniture, the choice is yours.

name: Crash Course Builder
description: Can you make it to the finish line? Crash your kart through impossible obstacle courses that will leave you wanting just… one… more… go! 2ez? Pfft! Build your own course to share with other crash test dummies!

name: Dungeon Evolution: Nemesis
description: Face the ever-evolving Nemesis, utilizing your character's skills and attributes to overcome challenges. Explore the mysterious dungeon, encounter thrilling events, and make strategic decisions. Are you ready to embark on an endless adventure in "Dungeon Evolution: Nemesis"?

name: NeoCars
description: Original and immersive cyberpunk driving game. Use your drifts to make your lines deadly for your opponents. Solo, local cooperative and online multiplayer modes. Play on a team with players of the same or different colors. Immersive soundtrack. Unique and stimulating gaming experience.

name: Tercios: Honor and Glory
description: Strategy and army management in real time of the 16th and 17th century of the Spanish Tercios. Take command of the army, relive the story of these brave men and their exploits, get resources, manage your soldiers, take cities, resist sieges and defeat your enemies in epic battles.

name: Who Did It?
description: Who Did It? Is a detective puzzle-game. Your job is to read the given case files to find out who the murderer is! Do you have what it takes to master all cases and close them all for good?

name: Team Five
description:
Five animals. Five exits. Five Minutes.

Demolish your friends online in a race against the clock. Boost your weapons to the max, annihilate the map so even its mother won't recognize it, and get the hell out!

name: Lost in Darkness
description: Lost in Darkness is a 3D top-down horror action game set in the snowy Atlas Mountains of Morocco. Deep in the Moroccan countryside, you are a Royal Gendarmerie motorcyclist who finds himself stranded alone in the woods while investigating the disappearance of a patrol car.

name: Cart Legends
description: Battle your way to being a legend in the world of carts!

name: Mage and Monsters II
description: Recruit a hero to lead your army, and use spells while they fight for you. Mage & Monsters 2 is an active auto battler, where you choose to either enhance the strength of your hero, reinforce the might of your army, or increase the power of your spells.

name: Stronghold Conquest
description: In this thrilling Tower Defense - type game, you will become the main defender of your kingdom. Build powerful guns and strategically deploy them on the battlefield to fend off waves of incoming enemies. Your goal is to protect your territory and destroy all threats using various types of guns.

name: Botanical Warden
description: Botanical Warden is a tactical roguelike deckbuilder in which plants are used to fight strategic challenging turn-based combat. Evolve your plants with artificial selection and hybridization to create endless possibilities in your quest to defeat other tribes and conquer a barren island.

name: Era One
description: Era One is an innovative space game that combines elements of real-time strategy, base building, space survival, and tactical battles. Players can create and customize their bases from scratch, construct various types of structures and warships, manage fleets, and engage in tactical space battles.

name: Sentinels
description: Sentinels is a free-to-play hero shooter game created by ClearSky Studio. Master the powerful abilities of the various agent characters in the game and experience tactical squad play, fast-paced hero shooting and team deathmatch.

name: Parkour Labs
description: Are you good at parkour video games? Are you number 1 in surfing mode? This is your game, welcome to Parkour Labs, an experience that will test your skills.

name: Single Malt Apocalypse
description: Not everything is fine in the small mining town of Cinderbrook. Your task is to find out what on earth is happening in the shadows of the town! Solve the mystery in this old-school adventure game with RPG influences!

name: We Need to Cook
description: We need to cook! You are a drug-designing genius, living a bland existence in a middle-class neighborhood in Utah. You decide you want more out of life, so you buy a beat-up RV, drive it into the desert, and cook drugs. Make immense profits!

name: Webventure
description: You and your friend will have work together to overcome challenges using your webs and creativity, helping each other and unraveling the mysteries of the forest.

name: Relic Guardian
description: "Relic Guardian" is a fantasy-style strategy tower defense game. As the builder on the battlefield, summon a variety of defense towers and spells with reliable hero companions to complete this epic and guarding adventure!

name: Guilded
description: Manage a fantasy adventurer's guild and make a lot of money... I mean save the kingdom from a looming threat! Recruit heroes, create quests to send them on and upgrade your guild's facilities.

name: Neo Junk City
description: Dive into Neo Junk City, a cyberpunk adventure where you’re an android detective unraveling your own murky past. Navigate neon streets, engage with unique characters, and race through the rain-soaked city. Uncover secrets in this twist on point-and-click gameplay.

name: Unsane 2
description: Unsane 2 is an arcade style FPS. Run and gun or hack and slash your way through open world and dungeon depths on procedural maps. Leader boards track your best scores against zombies, skeletons, and other baddies.

name: Sujimon Quest
description: Gaaru must set off on a journey to capture the legendary Sujimon in order to save all the people of her village and bring back peace.

name: Ancient Polis
description: Travel back 2600 years to ancient Greece. Build and manage your city (polis) and experience and shape the life of the ancient Greeks on your own terms.

name: Aquascapers
description: Bring Nature Home! Experience Aquascapers, a single-player and co-op aquascaping simulation that invites you and friends to discover and gather various ornamental resources for your aquascaping projects. Enhance your business and dominate the market!

name: Towers & Powers
description: It’s time to be a god! Save your residents and keep their islands from sinking in this VR tower defense game.

name: Asfalia: Fear
description: Adventure awaits you in this colorful, family-friendly point-and-click delight! Navigate through a world painted with emotions, where even 'fear' becomes a playful friend. Solve puzzles, collect stickers, and share giggles in a heartwarming journey in the world of emotions.

name: After Sunset
description: "After Sunset" is a ghost-based deckbuilder roguelike driven by a day-night circle system. Investigate the absurd deserted town to find hidden ghosts. Craft them to compose a unique team, and fight off weird humanoid creatures. In this eerie world, explore a sad story about "DEATH"

name: Royalty
description: Royalty is a strategy card game. Manage your population, economy, military, diplomacy, and religion. Enact policies, handle random events, and ensure your dynasty's survival amidst riots, coups, and invasions. Shape the destiny of your kingdom and leave a lasting legacy in Royalty.

name: Moen
description: Climb the mountain while you make friends. A multiplayer 3D platformer playground where you do whatever you feel like. You can climb the mountain, do activities around the Island or just chill out and meet new friends.

name: Rune Coliseum: Chained Warrior
description: A prologue to a RuneColiseum: deck-building roguelike game with unique semi-real-time combat system. Take your first steps in the Coliseum as a Chained Warrior. Find your fighting style and become the ultimate champion in this thrilling death tournament.

name: Anime Slayer
description: Embark on a mind-bending journey through a surrealistic realm in this captivating shooter game. Dive into a mesmerizing world where you find yourself pitted against an eclectic blend of adorable anime-inspired heroines and menacing extraterrestrial creatures.

name: D96: Kansei
description: An arcade online racing game in an open world that will allow you to experience the atmosphere of night roads, as well as participate in drift competitions with your friends. Tune up your car, get behind the wheel and race along the narrow, winding tracks of the drift valley!

name: Rush: Run Up Super High
description: Join this intense MMO 3D precision platformer! Leap, parkour, and climb massive, uncharted locations and compete against 199 others in a race to the top. With a perfect character control system, all you need is focus and patience to smash records and reach unprecedented heights!

name: Bumper Arena
description: Buckle up! Bumper Arena is a party game in which you drive a bumper car through a series of arenas featuring different mini-games. Bump and bounce your opponents off the walls, earn the most points during the round and try to win the game!

name: Hyouteki
description: Master your aim in Hyouteki, the ultimate aim training game. Unparalleled mouse responsiveness and endless customization. Dominate with precision!

name: Dungeon Descent
description: Brace yourself for a thrilling co-op adventure! Delve into the depths of perilous dungeons, face the undead onslaught, and carve your own medieval legend. Craft, strategize, survive - "Will you conquer the darkness?"

name: The Thundermans: Dr. Colosso On The Run
description: Dr. Colosso has escaped and he needs your help to keep evading the Thunderman kids in this fun online action game.

name: Say No to Rom-Coms!
description: When your attempt to ask out your crush is met with rejection, your classmate Mineko, who recently experienced similar heartbreak, ropes you into joining her visionary anti-romance club. Together, you form a movement to challenge the expectations of teenage romance and ideals, aka the hierarchy of hotness, that Mineko believes students use to determine if someone is worth dating or not. But things take an unexpected turn when she decides to run for student council president—the same position as the crush who rejected you—with the goal of destroying the hierarchy of hotness that plagues your school!

name: Retris
description: A fresh take on the the falling block puzzle genre. Embrace imperfection with glitches and broken pieces to overcome this new challenge. Chase high scores or learn new techniques in a puzzle mode with over 50 handcrafted puzzles.

name: Bunny Guys!
description: Welcome to Bunny Guys! Climb, explore and have fun or be frustrated? Fight your way to the top with full of obstacles that want to stop you from reaching the top.

name: Nok
description: Get ready to Nok it out of the park with this immersive physics-based sandbox hidden object game! Step into a virtual world where you'll toss your worries aside and dive headfirst into the wild art of furniture flinging.

name: VRosty
description: Pull-along VRosty, the little snowman, through a warming world in this VR-only puppet-puzzle-platformer. His life is hanging by a thread.

name: Dark Deception: Chapter 5
description: Dark Deception mixes the fast-paced style of classic arcade games with fun horror game design. Trapped in a dark world full of nightmarish mazes and anxiety-inducing monsters, the only way out is to face the darkness and find a way to survive.

name: Snapback
description: Snapback is a Speed-Runner Puzzle Platformer set in a robot dystopia where you are recruited to rebel against the evil GovCorp overlords, break the rules, and join the resistance!

name: Top Gnome
description: A top down shooter where the only way to move and fight is with the recoil of your blunderbuss. Whirl through waves of garden-destroying pests to defend Bert's garden, strive to reach higher and higher scores and become the Top Gnome!

name: Bone Born
description: Bone Born is Topdown, defense, casual and Co-op online game. make your skeleton with your friends and family to defend the infinity waves of demon enemies.

name: Micro Games: Volume 1
description: Retro 2D collection of 4 micro games

name: Tactics Greed
description: Aim for the top of the arena by using unique tactics combining units, magic, and formations! Casual action real-time strategy game that can be played with one hand!

name: February of Cards
description: This is a card game where you place 28 cards arranged like a calendar and compete with your opponent by taking the coins placed there and combining them with bonuses obtained by taking them continuously. Choose a player from among 26 alphabet characters and aim for the strongest.

name: Outrunner: Neon Nights
description: Outrunner: Neon Nights merges arcade racing with snake-style mechanics. Race, jump, and defy gravity as you outsmart your opponents. Whether you prefer intense one-on-one duels or chaotic multiplayer mayhem, you can join the neon-lit arenas online with up to 8 players.

name: Spooky Crew: Mask of the Mysterium
description: Join the Spooky Crew and uncover the secret of the Mask of the Mysterium in this point and click adventure game. An encounter with a masked figure leads the crew to investigate the secrets of a local museum.

name: The Mobius Machine
description: Discover a vast alien world. Fight the ferocious local fauna and killer machines. Reveal its secrets and find a way to escape. The Mobius Machine is a side-scroller action platformer with dynamic combat and heavy emphasis on exploration.

name: Heartwood Online
description: Heartwood Online is a cross-platform free-to-play MMO. Explore a vast world filled with adventure where you choose your own path. Immerse yourself in crafting, trade, PvP & PvE battles, guilds, politics, and a thriving player economy.

name: Little Monster
description: Little Monster is a — fast paced and fun — beat 'em up game. You play as little monster whose goal is to prevent nightmare spirits from entering our minds while sleeping.

name: Our Dark Heart
description: ODH is a story rich, physcological, survival, horror, game with retro flair.

name: Curse of Blood
description: This is a game about survival and betrayal. Ten explorers ventured to the corrupted land to prevent the arrival of the Blood Moon. The bad news is that there are werewolves and vampires mixed in.

name: Bloody Hills
description: Bloody Hills is an intense and heart-pounding survival horror game set in the depths of a secluded forest camp. As night falls, you find yourself trapped in a twisted game of cat and mouse with a relentless killer known as The Hiker. Armed with only your wits and limited resources, you must fight to survive until dawn while evading the sadistic clutches of this merciless predator.

name: The Adventures of Panzer 2
description: Set approximately 1 year after the events of the first game, Panzer returns to his role as Raid Leader of the Zergadins. The old team has been "recruited", an all-new state-of-the-art headquarters built, and a world of adventure awaits!

name: Crocogame
description: Crocogame is a fast-paced roguelite game with intense moment-to-moment combat and flexible character customization. Use your resources efficiently to take on increasingly difficult threats. Great challenges also bring great rewards!

name: Shred the Undead
description: Shredthe Undead, is a 4 player musical co-op hack-and-slash games. Instead of warriors, elves and wizards, you will be slaying zombies with guitars, drum sticks and piano keys. Travel from LA to Hell in 28 levels.

name: Guardians
description: Guardians, an extraordinary action role-playing game that transports you to a captivating universe teeming with danger, discovery, and heroism. Immerse yourself in a sprawling, post-apocalyptic world where chaos-infected creatures roam, and the fate of civilization rests on your shoulders.

name: Retrowave World
description: Neon lights, palm trees, synthwave, chrome robot women, speeding 80s supercars... Welcome to Retrowave World!

name: Lazarus A.D. 2222
description: The final part of the Sons of Welder game series, set in a dystopian universe, which uniquely combines games from the Magnus series. A game that you can experience on two levels. Hand-drawn motion comics. A metaphorical journey into oneself. A mystical experience with a touch of good humor.

name: Black Box Lss: The Shining Immortal
description: Immerse yourself in a pixel-art AVG that blends thrilling crime, romantic comedy, and the pursuit of love. This game depicts the story of a new employee pursuing his female boss. If you're a fan of love, yandere, and don't mind a touch of thrill and crime, you will greatly enjoy this game.

name: Ulton's Quest
description: Ulton's Quest is a cute 2D indie platformer with a pseudo-cyberpunk atmosphere and charming pixel art. Venture into the role of Ulton Gograk, an adorable orc and defeat the fearsome Commander Maximus Tauro before it is too late!

name: A Dog of Flanders
description: A Dog of Flanders is an adventure game based on the novel of the same name by the British author Ouida.

name: Manaclysm
description: Manaclysm is an online bullet-hell brawler where up to 60 mages battle to gather enough power to escape the destruction of an unstable realm. Slay enemy mages to upgrade your Mana gauge and arsenal of spells. Invite friends to a private game, or hop into ranked matchmaking for some massive brawls!
